fields.name: The White Laboratory
fields.description: The White Laboratory is a sandbox style physics-based tower defense and RTS game in which you modularly build and command robotic structures. Use them to defend against or conquer other disobedient mechanical blocks on a facility floating in the atmosphere of a remote gas planet.

fields.name: Frane: Dragons' Odyssey
fields.description: An odyssey to the world below! Set out for in search of a missing girl and venture out in a fantasy action RPG!

fields.name: Malevolence: The Sword of Ahkranox
fields.description: Enter the world of Ahkranox - the first ever genuinely infinite first person roguelike. Become the incarnate form of a sentient Sword, protecting a realm of dreams from the shadows of its own tormented soul, and stand as an eternal guardian against the infinite darkness that threatens to consume all.

fields.name: Onigiri
fields.description: Onigiri is an MMO Action RPG with a fast weapon changing battle system. Join a party of other players or travel with 8 NPC companions on your journey. With simple controls, you can dive into the thrilling world of Onigiri. Switch between weapons to battle through the Youkai.

fields.name: Streng Check
fields.description: A classic runner is waiting for you, in which you will visit dangerous streets and ordeals. The character is in the territory contaminated with radiation, so in order to survive, you will have to collect an antidote! Pass the strength test and exceed your results to see the whole dangerous world of our game!

fields.name: Night Crisis
fields.description: Night Crisis is based upon a multiplayer co-op experience. There will be multiple factions of enemies to take down, which may have units on the ground, in the air and on sea.

fields.name: Faerie Solitaire Harvest
fields.description: Match cards, rescue Faeries, and raise Magical Pets as you explore the many and vast enchanted worlds of Faerie Solitaire Harvest!

fields.name: Courier of the Crypts
fields.description: Courier of the Crypts is a 2D puzzle adventure game where you have to survive as a Courier on his first errand to the ominous crypts. Main tool to achieve the mission is a Magic Torch which you use to illuminate your path, defend from darkness and solve puzzles - it must never run out!

fields.name: Windscape
fields.description: In Windscape you play as a young girl living on your parents’ farm, set in a lovely world made up of floating islands in the sky. As you discover the world you learn that something has gone terribly wrong - islands are breaking apart and falling from the sky!

fields.name: Tanzia
fields.description: Unravel the mystery of your grandfather's disappearance while preventing a terrible evil from destroying your island home. Tanzia is a single-player RPG that combines fast-paced strategic combat with elements of favorite classic RPGs in an open 3D world of magic and monsters.

fields.name: Ymir
fields.description: Ymir is a 4X multiplayer strategy game combined with a city builder where each player develops a civilization of pigmen starting at the stone age.

fields.name: Aurora Dusk: Steam Age
fields.description: An amazing mix of RPG, strategy, simulation, sandbox and survival game. Aurora Dusk looks like many other games, but instead of being alone, you live in a community. You can play one or more villagers and evolve from the Wood Age to the Steam Age.

fields.name: Out of Space
fields.description: Strategy co-op multiplayer game about living on a spaceship with your roommates. You'll need to generate resources, take care of a deadly alien infestation, upgrade your appliances and build your own sustainable space home. Living together is never easy, especially when you are in outer space!

fields.name: Staxel
fields.description: Grow your farm, meet the villagers, and join your friends online in building your world.

fields.name: Eczema Angel Orifice
fields.description: the only game that will turn you into a woman

fields.name: Peasant Knight
fields.description: Peasant Knight is a challenging puzzle-platformer that you can play with only two keys: jump and stop. All the while you're relentlessly dashing forward into traps, enemies, and hazards.

fields.name: Heathen Engineering's Terran
fields.description: Galactic Strategy | Tactics | Action! Found an empire and expand across the stars, command massive fleets in interstellar conflicts and pilot powerful warships as you battle for victory in Heathen Engineering’s Terran.

fields.name: Weekend Drive
fields.description: Weekend Drive is all about fun. The game is primarily a first person shooter and you can also drive vehicles. In Weekend Drive the environment is completely destructible and you can pick up and throw items, or run over enemies with your vehicle, or crash into buildings and demolish them.

fields.name: Tavern Tycoon - Dragon's Hangover
fields.description: Run your fantasy RPG tavern - let travellers take shelter for the night and serve 'em the best mead of their life with a good dose of humor.

fields.name: Forever Lost: Episode 1
fields.description: Awaking in a mind you don’t know to a world you can’t remember. Surrounded by things that can’t be real, haunted by experiences long forgotten.

fields.name: Cube Land Arena
fields.description: The kingdom of Cubia call for your help, come to this vast kingdom where you will face strong enemies and hard challenges, you are the chosen to defend the cristals of life and finally bring peace to reign of Cubia.

fields.name: CounterAttack
fields.description: CounterAttack is a side scrolling space shooter (shmup). Team up or fight solo, 1 - 4 player local or up to 8 players online coop, unlock upgrades, use powerful ultimate abilities, enhance your ship the way you want, and save the Earth from annihilation.

fields.name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
fields.description: First Person Tennis is the first tennis simulator developed for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and WMR. Now, you can play on a real tennis court and face professional tennis players. You'll have to show all your technical and tactical skills. The game is designed for gamepad or keyboard too.

fields.name: Katana ZERO
fields.description: Katana ZERO is a stylish neo-noir, action-platformer featuring breakneck action and instant-death combat. Slash, dash, and manipulate time to unravel your past in a beautifully brutal acrobatic display.

fields.name: Dead Army - Radio Frequency
fields.description: Dead Army is a Real Time Strategy (RTS) game where the player takes control of an army of zombies. The player will be able to command each and every zombie in order to create the best strategy to raze military bases, villages and small towns.

fields.name: Second Coming
fields.description: Second Coming is a sci-fi cartoon gamebook with turn-based 3D battles (xcom-style). It is a sci-fi adventure where you and your team explore an alien ship and uncovers its secrets. This game will appeal to both gamebook enthusiasts as more traditional gamers - extending the gamebook format with digital effects and narration.
fields.developer: Seen in a Dream, KLURA Design
fields.publisher: Seen in a Dream, KLURA Design

fields.name: Lord of Dwarves
fields.description: Gather resources, craft weapons, and build a castle. Then defend your castle against monsters who will try to siege, sap, and smash their way in. All in a procedurally generated 3D block world that allows for extensive crafting and total construction and destruction of the terrain.

fields.name: Hardware Engineers
fields.description: Hardware Engineers is a simulation game where you have to manage a IT business. In a world where technology expands every day, you will need to learn how to be competitive.

fields.name: Quest Hunter
fields.description: Quest Hunter is an isometric action-RPG where your choice drives the story. Find tons of treasures and secrets, solve puzzles, equip your character, level up your skills and finish off enemy bosses. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

fields.name: God's Trigger
fields.description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities to inflict violence in the most graphic way possible.

fields.name: Wolfpack
fields.description: A crew of players experience the tense atmosphere of a WW2 U-boat, manning the stations in this realistic co-op simulation game. Several crews may play together in a wolfpack, completing missions based on iconic events during the different stages of German U-boat warfare between 1939 and 1945.

fields.name: Tropico 6
fields.description: El Presidente is back! Prove yourself once again as a feared dictator or peace-loving statesman on the island state of Tropico and shape the fate of your very own banana republic through four distinctive eras.

fields.name: Road to your City
fields.description: Road to your City is a city building and management game with a heavy emphasis on football. Slipping into the role of mayor, you are tasked with establishing a successful football club and developing it from grassroots to world class powerhouse.

fields.name: MageWorks
fields.description: MageWorks is a casual exploration Mage simulation game. With your spellbook in one hand, and your staff in the other, wander the land discovering new spells and enemies. Customize your spellbook and craft your staff which can be 3D printed in reality!

fields.name: Grid Legion, Storm
fields.description: You are a conjurer voyaging Mythos. Explore an easy to learn but difficult to master strategy card game.

fields.name: Aussie Sports VR 2016
fields.description: Aussie Sports VR 2016 invites you into Australia’s sporting community to meet the players, see the fans, feel the passion and be a spectator at major events of 2016. Explore Australia's favourite sports and play mini games: AFL, Basketball, Cricket, Football and Rugby.

fields.name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
fields.description: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a wacky physics-based tactics game. Experience accurate warfare through the ages. TABS uses state of the art physics-based simulation to provide you with never-before-seen insight to our greatest battles of history.

fields.name: The Mystery Of Woolley Mountain
fields.description: Funded on Kickstarter with backers including legend of the genre Ron Gilbert, The Mystery of Woolley Mountain is an otherworldly point-and-click adventure - filled with strange beasts, evil witches, confused automatons and wacky ropemen.

fields.name: Siege of Centauri
fields.description: Thousands of alien machines are descending on Earth's first interstellar colony in this massive-scale new tower defense game from the publisher of Ashes of the Singularity and Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion.

fields.name: Nock: Hidden Arrow
fields.description: Nock: Hidden Arrow is a stealth archery dungeon crawl full of sneaking, shooting, throwing, and the occasional surprise bout of frantic combat. No potions, xp, hit point management, or penny pinching for gear upgrades. The focus is on action, feel, and theme.

fields.name: Akuto: Showdown
fields.description: Akuto: Showdown is an award-nominated, isometric, fast-paced action game where players compete with swords and guns in intense versus matches.

fields.name: KARDS
fields.description: KARDS is an exciting free to play collectible card game set in WWII, full of strategy, tactics, action and fun! Play as any of the major powers of WWII and participate in epic battles against other players, or as a single player against the cunning AI. Battles are won by cunning, tactics, experience and strategy.

fields.name: Feather
fields.description: Feather is a serene game about exploration and immersion in a beautiful landscape. Become a bird, fly around and lose yourself in zen-like flow whilst listening to the soothing ambient soundtrack.

fields.name: Pathway
fields.description: Adventure into the strange unknown with Pathway, a strategy RPG set in the 1930s great desert wilderness. Outwit your enemies in daring turn-based combat, raid occult tombs and make tough choices in a procedurally generated grand pulp expedition!

fields.name: Rend
fields.description: Epic fantasy adventure meets competitive survival in Rend. Inspired by the fabled universe of Nordic myth, choose to play solo in Classic and Exploration modes to build your stronghold, tame brutal creatures, and conquer enemy players or play among three rival factions in Faction War mode.

fields.name: RPG Fighter League
fields.description: In a world where everything is settled in a fight. Unfold the story of Henry Forge and his ascension in the Fighter League. Prepare yourself to encounter the most challenging fight of your life. Can you assemble the perfect team to defeat all the challenges made by the Architect?

fields.name: Fovos VR
fields.description: Fovos is a post-apocalyptic horror, rail shooter for the HTC Vive, set in a future where an omnipotent AI is taking over human brains through genetic implants.

fields.name: Mars Underground
fields.description: Mars Underground is an apocalyptic adventure where you relive the same day over and over. With each cycle new items can be picked up and topics unlocked.​ Explore the possibilities of this timeloop and uncover multiple endings.

fields.name: Stickmageddon
fields.description: Stickmen rebelled against their god, you! They are going to throw you off the heaven. Don't let them do it by bringing Stickmageddon down on their heads. Use and upgrade your god skills to stop them!

fields.name: Production Line : Car factory simulation
fields.description: Production line is the new car factory management/simulation/tycoon game that pushes your organisational and entrepreneurship skills to the limit. Can you build the ultimate optimised, free-flowing car production line whilst beating the competition and still turn a profit?

fields.name: Devil May Cry 5
fields.description: The ultimate Devil Hunter is back in style, in the game action fans have been waiting for.

fields.name: Micronomicon: Heroes
fields.description: Classic tactical role-playing fantasy game with turn-based style of combat!

fields.name: Train Valley 2
fields.description: Drive forward the industrial revolution in our train tycoon puzzle game! Build an efficient railroad, upgrade your locomotives, and keep all trains on track to meet the ever-growing demand of the cities and industries in your tiny valley. Choo-choo!
fields.developer: Alexey Davydov, Sergey Dvoynikov, Timofey Shargorodskiy
fields.publisher: Alexey Davydov, Sergey Dvoynikov, Timofey Shargorodskiy

fields.name: MECCHA ZOMBIES
fields.description: Refreshingly knock out massive impending zombies, in this new top-down shooter! Clean up zombies and earn GOLD to boost up your skill and ability, and aim for 100% area capture!
fields.developer: X-STREAM DIGITAL Co., Ltd., PARSEC G.K., DELTA MOON
fields.publisher: X-STREAM DIGITAL Co., Ltd., PARSEC G.K., DELTA MOON

fields.name: Shotgun Farmers
fields.description: Shotgun Farmers is the multiplayer shooter where missed shots grow new guns! The longer a gun plant grows, the more ammo it will have!

fields.name: Battle Bolts
fields.description: Battle Bolts is a strategy multiplayer game where up to 4 players battle in a deadly arena by programming their moves in advance!

fields.name: Don't Escape: 4 Days in a Wasteland
fields.description: Survive through four days at the end of the world in this post-apocalyptic point-and-click thriller where your choices could keep you alive... or not.

fields.name: Fight of Gods
fields.description: Your prayers have been answered! For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

fields.name: Lanternium
fields.description: You have to find out what happened in this fantastic world and help the Raccoon find his way home!

fields.name: Winter's Empty Mask - Visual novel
fields.description: Ichirou recently moved back to Momiji, there he reunites with his childhood friend, Reika, but he also meets a strange girl who has a clear crush for him. With time new feelings are born and he will have to choose which girl he likes the most, but there could be unexpected consequences.

fields.name: Fate/EXTELLA LINK
fields.description: History, legend, and sci-fi collide in the latest chapter of the Fate/EXTRA saga! Join 26 Heroic Spirits from all across time as they hack and slash their way across the battlefields of SE.RA.PH, a digital realm for the last survivors of Earth.

fields.name: Weedcraft Inc
fields.description: Weedcraft Inc explores the business of producing, breeding and selling weed in America, delving deep into the financial, political and cultural aspects of the country's complex relationship with this troublesome and promising plant.

fields.name: Icesolation
fields.description: Icesolation is a highly challenging two-player local co-operative puzzle and exploration game for VR. A pair of researchers were investigating an old top-secret Soviet expedition deep in Siberia, when one of them got trapped inside a mysterious mine. They must now work together to find a way back outside.

fields.name: Whispers of a Machine
fields.description: Whispers of a Machine is a Sci-Fi Nordic Noir that tells the story of Vera, a cybernetically augmented detective in a post-AI world, who investigates a string of murders and unravels a dark conflict over forbidden technology.

fields.name: The Last Sigil
fields.description: The Last Sigil is a roguelite action RPG. Create your guild, hire randomly generated characters with different traits, stats and skills, and enter the Sigils to vanquish an ancient evil and his army of monsters.

fields.name: Risk of Rain 2
fields.description: The classic multiplayer roguelike, Risk of Rain, returns with an extra dimension and more challenging action. Play solo, or team up with up to three friends to fight your way through hordes of monsters, unlock new loot, and find a way to escape the planet.

fields.name: Serious Sam: Tormental
fields.description: Serious Sam: Tormental is a 3D rogue-lite top-down shooter where you blast your way through the tormented mind of demigod of destruction Mental, as he imagines worlds and monsters that stand on your path towards his inner ego. Let the showdown begin!

fields.name: Skyfront VR
fields.description: Skyfront is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS built exclusively for VR. The game launches you into mesmerising zero-G arenas. But not before equipping you with an array of awesome weapons and impressive special abilities.

fields.name: Space Junkies™
fields.description: Space Junkies™ is a visceral, jetpack-fueled VR Arcade Shooter where you fly through deadly Orbital Arenas in hostile space, facing off in extreme battles!

fields.name: Nucvivor
fields.description: Are you ready for a post-apocalyptic adventure? Nucvivor is one of the greatest independent games that has you fight to survive. You will feel Death breathing down the back of your neck as you fight against deadly incendiary radiation, hunger, thirst, cold and poisonous weather.

fields.name: RICO
fields.description: Two cops, one case and only 24 hours to bust the bad guys! Become a loose cannon police detective and face off with criminal gangs in this procedurally-generated action movie FPS. Join forces with a friend and take down those crooks, buddy-cop style!

fields.name: Bomb Chicken
fields.description: After a freak accident, a seemingly ordinary chicken becomes a bomb laying free range hero. Explore the versatile mechanic of laying bombs in this explosive exploration platformer.

fields.name: Tanks2.DE
fields.description: Tanks2.DE is a 2D online multiplayer tank shooter, currently featuring 2 nations with over 30 tanks from the World War 2 era. The game is in a stable open beta state and receives continuous updates.

fields.name: Progress Bar Simulator
fields.description: Ever wanted to accelerate the progress bar of your download, slow installation, Windows update or just to kill some time until something else has finished?

fields.name: Zombotron
fields.description: Fight to survive on a mysterious alien planet, outwit its vicious inhabitants, and do whatever it takes to find a way off that wretched rock.

fields.name: Skirmish Line
fields.description: Experience the brutality and randomness of war as an Allied tactical commander in the Pacific Theater during World War 2. Train, equip, and command a squad of soldiers as you fight against the fanatical Imperial Japanese Empire.

fields.name: Drunken Wrestlers 2
fields.description: Drunken Wrestlers 2 is a funny physics-based multiplayer fighting game with Steam Workshop support.

fields.name: The Puppet of Tersa: Episode One
fields.description: When you lose something under your bed, where does it go? Cynthia discovers the answer to that question in this hand-drawn, point-and-click fantasy adventure.

fields.name: Nation War:Chronicles | 国战:列国志传
fields.description: This is a theme of spring and autumn and Warring States strategy + real-time combat sandbox game. The game began in the eighth century BC, the vast land of China, at this time was a powerful Zhou royal family, because the fate of the Son of Heaven and the constant civil strife in the royal family has been declining gradually, all the...

fields.name: Zup! XS
fields.description: Experimental minimal physical puzzle with explosions.

fields.name: DriftForce
fields.description: DriftForce is a super fast endless racing game. Easy to learn, hard to master. Maneuver through the procedurally generated maps and avoid obstacles while collecting score. Survive as long as possible and chase your latest high score!

fields.name: Xenomarine
fields.description: Experience hardcore, sci-fi dungeon crawling in this dark, atmospheric roguelike. Xenomarine offers tactical turn-based combat with hundreds of unique items and upgradable weapons and armor, as well as massive replayability thanks to its randomly generated content.

fields.name: Hotlap Heroes
fields.description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engines and invite your friends over for some seriously chaotic single-screen multiplayer racing for up to 8 players in HOTLAP HEROES.

fields.name: Riot Street
fields.description: Riot Street is a tactical driven team shooter dedicated to close quarters combat on urbanized terrain.

fields.name: MarZ: Tactical Base Defense
fields.description: Build your defense base to fight back the undead hordes of Mars and secure the future of the red planet. MarZ is a game of strategy and tactical defense where you must carefully manage your crew and resources as you try to uncover the terrible secrets of the undead.

fields.name: Shoppe Keep 2 - Business and Agriculture RPG Simulation
fields.description: Shoppe Keep returns bigger and better than ever! Build your business empire and defend it from thieves. Explore the open-world in single-player or with up to 4 players online. Renovate and design your store, cook, fish, hunt for products, charm customers, evolve the town, and make your millions.

fields.name: JetX VR
fields.description: JetX, new ambitious arena shooter game available on both PC and VR

fields.name: Hunt 'n Sneak
fields.description: Light is both friend and foe in Hunt ‘n Sneak – a manic party game set in a world where mystical creatures dwell. Threatened by the fearsome Gobblers, the Pixies’ struggle for survival has begun. Will you use your wit to sneak past the Gobblers, or use your cunning to hunt the elusive Pixies?

fields.name: Black Survival / 黑色幸存者
fields.description: Black Survival is a Real-Time Survival Game, where you must survive by any means out of 10 competitors in a deserted island. Make split-second decisions with a single click! Immerse yourself in the fierce battle for survival; you do not have a second to spare! Search, Craft, Attack, and Run!

fields.name: Continuous Girl
fields.description: This is a casual game, the gameplay is eliminated for the connection, and it is suitable for adult children to play because of the thrilling content.

fields.name: Galactic Crew
fields.description: Galactic Crew is a roguelike sci-fi exploration game. You and your valorous crew members will explore a galaxy far away, with all its dangers and riches. Explore planets, upgrade and retrofit your ship, mine asteroids, trade with merchants, and unlock more content!

fields.name: notmycar
fields.description: notmycar is a white-knuckle, lead-footed vehicular battle royale. Buckle up, buttercup.

fields.name: Metaverse Keeper / 元能失控
fields.description: Metaverse Keeper is a dungeon crawler with roguelike elements where four heroes join forces to save the “Metaverse" – created when a cosmic event tangled space-time. Explore randomly-generated worlds, customize your weapons, and fight crazy monsters – in solo or co-op mode!

fields.name: Generation Zero
fields.description: Welcome to 1980’s Sweden. The local population has disappeared, and hostile machines roam the streets. Explore the open world to unravel the mystery, perfect your fighting strategies, and prepare to strike back. Play alone or together with up to three friends, as you discover ways to defeat the invaders.

fields.name: Space Survivors Shooter
fields.description: Hello Space Survivors, this is little shooter game. Which is now most about shooting zombies put pvp will hopefully follow.
fields.developer: Maurice Fernitz, Felix Gillmann, Enrico Przibilla, Robert Schuricht
fields.publisher: Maurice Fernitz, Felix Gillmann, Enrico Przibilla, Robert Schuricht

fields.name: BLOCKPOST
fields.description: Procedural cubic 3D-shooter in the best traditions of the genre. The game is a rich cocktail consisting of the most popular and functional gaming solutions. Customization of characters, opening cases and improving the existing arsenal — all this is available in the game now.

fields.name: Slapshot
fields.description: Slapshot is an online multiplayer game where you and 5 other players play a game of hockey. The game is physics-based, so teamwork and crisp passing are essential to win. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

fields.name: Eternity: The Last Unicorn
fields.description: Classic RPG, with lore based on Norse mythology. Travel through mesmerizing locations, meet fantasy characters and fight to protect Elven immortality.

fields.name: LEFT ALIVE™
fields.description: LEFT ALIVE™ is a brand-new survival action shooter telling a human story of survival from the perspective of three different protagonists during the devastating invasion set in war-torn Novo Slava in 2127.

fields.name: DeadlandVR : Action Shooter FPS
fields.description: Deadland VR is a story about when Zombie Apocalypse Happens, Everyone Runs and Hide. Except for us Gamers who've been waiting for this day all life. Are you the One...? If So, then better hold your position, gather up your Guns and Load-up, because these creatures Run, Fly and Shoot.

fields.name: Eight Dragons
fields.description: Can you and up to seven of your friends defeat the criminal gangs of the city and stop MR BIG? Prove your skills in EIGHT DRAGONS, an old-school scrolling beat-'em-up straight outta the eighties!

fields.name: Trancelation
fields.description: A dynamic arcade game set in a neon universe full of fractals and translations! Boost your memory, develop new skills, and improve your scores to become a master of Trancelation in this ever-changing journey through linguistics!

fields.name: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War
fields.description: A Turn-based Strategy game in a futuristic global cold war from the award-winning creators of Out There. Recruit a squad of special agents and run your intel agency to secure the control of the singularity.

fields.name: Dark Devotion
fields.description: Explore the secrets of a mysterious fallen temple and put your Templar faith to the test in Dark Devotion, where no sacrifice is too great in praise of your God.

fields.name: Driftland: The Magic Revival
fields.description: After a devastating war between ancient mages, a powerful spell is all that holds together the shattered planet of Driftland. Take on the role of a powerful mage capable of moving and connecting floating lands, develop a mighty empire, and restore Driftland to its former glory!

fields.name: Toran
fields.description: In this sci-fi puzzle adventure "short game" you are a scientist, stranded on a distant moon during an expedition to investigate alien remains. After finding a strange platform, what seemed to be a one way trip might turn into an intergalactic odyssey.

fields.name: The Rift
fields.description: A short platforming game about self sacrifice.

fields.name: Vacation Simulator
fields.description: Welcome to the Vacation Simulator: a rough approximation of VACATION inspired by real human NOT JOBBING, brought to you by the same robots behind the Job Simulator. Reallocate your bandwidth and get ready to splash, s’more, snowball, and selfie your way to optimal relaxation!

fields.name: Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced
fields.description: Discover the original co-op shooter-looter, crammed with new enhancements! As one of 4 trigger-happy mercenaries with RPG progression, equip bazillions of guns to take on the desert planet Pandora.

fields.name: The Wild Age
fields.description: The Wild Age is a micromanagement strategy game with tower defense gameplay mechanics. The game is designed mainly for a peaceful and relaxed gaming experience that offers a break from the busy realities of life.

fields.name: Ultimate Coaster X
fields.description: Ultimate Coaster X is a free roller coaster simulator built with simplicity and utility in mind. The in-game roller coaster and world editors allow you to create and experience rides of many types.

fields.name: Steamcraft
fields.description: Steamcraft is a multiplayer shooter in a steampunk setting. Build a one-of-a-kind vehicle for land and air battles, equip it with weapons, and crush your foes!

fields.name: Baba Is You
fields.description: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where the rules you have to follow are present as blocks you can interact with. By manipulating them, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find in the levels and cause surprising interactions!

fields.name: We. The Revolution
fields.description: As a judge of the Revolutionary Tribunal, preside over complicated cases of ordinary citizens, dangerous criminals, and enemies of the revolution in revolutionary Paris. Make judgments, plot political intrigue, and try to not lose your own head!

fields.name: Here & Elsewhere
fields.description: It is twenty thousand years in the future and our signals have been received, but it is too late for life on earth. The hyper dimensional crystals have arrived to a blasted wasteland.

fields.name: The Deepest House
fields.description: A sleek 'n' squishy top-down 3D roguelike action game.

fields.name: RIFF VR
fields.description: RIFF VR is a one of a kind music role playing experience. Use VR technology to become the guitarist, drummer, or singer of your own band. Customize performance environments and band setups. Stream your gameplay with built in OBS and LIV support.

fields.name: Monjarmageddon
fields.description: Monjarmageddon is a satirical retro styled 2D platformer that provides a challenge for expert and new gamers alike to enjoy. Navigate six zones divided in two acts each, cleansing the world of communist demons in this piece of art while playing a game that will remind you of 8 and 16 bit classics of the nineties.

fields.name: Jetstream
fields.description: Jetstream is an elegant and relaxing puzzle game where you soar amongst the clouds. Play through dozens of sculpted levels as you guide your plane to its destination. Jetstream has been designed to be a frictionless experience - it’s just you and the puzzles!

fields.name: Haxor
fields.description: Retro pixels are back! Good old 80s/90s style is back! Enjoy a classic 2D platformer with old era graphics! 16x16 pixel sprites and ambient, flat chip tuned 8 bit music! Guide Kla, the last survivor from Haxor planet, through the world full of vicious creatures, deadly traps and giant bosses!

fields.name: Technosphere - Collector's Edition
fields.description: This is a story about a brave engineer who repaired the transmitters using a special drone called TECHNOSPHERE.

fields.name: Gadgeteer
fields.description: Gadgeteer is a physics-based VR puzzle game where you build chain reaction machines to solve fun, intricate puzzles. Your machines will use gadgets to launch, bump, twist, and turn—creating chain reactions that may even end up tearing apart the fabric of space-time.

fields.name: Spoxel
fields.description: Explore, customize, and build across the world of Spoxel as you fight the otherworlders. Use runes to construct custom powerful or infuse weapons and armor with rare resources. Explore an infinite world while you build a base to establish a foothold of power to defend from your enemies!

fields.name: A song in the void
fields.description: Imagine a world where music is your last hope. Embark on an extraordinary journey across a strange planet and attempt to uncover its secrets. Discover the history of your people and take control of your destiny.

fields.name: OrbusVR: Reborn
fields.description: OrbusVR: Reborn is a ground-up rework of OrbusVR, the only MMORPG designed exclusively for room-scale virtual reality. It includes a re-imagining of the original game, with gorgeous hand-painted visuals, new enemies, new dungeons and raids, new classes, and much more.

fields.name: The Padre
fields.description: The Padre is a retro stylised 3D horror adventure game tapping deep into the roots of classic horror games.

fields.name: 7th Sector
fields.description: Welcome to the 7th Sector, set in a mysterious cyberpunk world. Immerse yourself on this intricate path, solving different puzzles, facing its dangers and collecting scattered information to discover the story of this world.

fields.name: ETHEREAL
fields.description: A profound experience that carries players into an unknown and mysterious world surrounded by carefully designed puzzles...

fields.name: Forager
fields.description: The highly popular and quirky "idle game that you want to actively keep playing". Explore, craft, gather & manage resources, find secrets and build your base out of nothing! Buy land to explore and expand!

fields.name: Shawy Adventures
fields.description: Shawy Adventures is a Retro Action Platformer inspired on the early Game Boy games.

fields.name: The World Next Door
fields.description: An addictive mix of lightning-fast puzzle battles, powerful storytelling and immersive visual novel elements, The World Next Door follows Jun, a rebellious teen girl trapped in a parallel realm inhabited by magical creatures, who must find her way home before time runs out.

fields.name: ONE PIECE World Seeker
fields.description: Leave your compass behind and join Luffy as he embarks on a brand new action-packed adventure where you can experience the powers of the legendary Gum-Gum fruit to uncover hidden secrets on an original, never-before-seen island!

fields.name: Robot Warriors
fields.description: Slash and shoot everyone in your way in this hack and slash game. Kill a lot of enemies and find a way to the exit to complete missions.

fields.name: Truberbrook / Trüberbrook
fields.description: Enjoy an adventurous vacation to a 1960's parallel universe! A Sci-Fi-Mystery Adventure Game with handmade scenery.

fields.name: Cat Burglar: A Tail of Purrsuit
fields.description: Cat Burglar is a short, light-hearted, stealth, puzzle platformer with a pet charity awareness campaign. Help Kat find her way into the Dogo Corps base to discover Major Bulls' master plan.

fields.name: ManaRocks
fields.description: ManaRocks is a new type of online strategy card game called Seasonal Card Game. On SCGs you will experience a Real Free to Play game, no Booster Packs no Loot Boxes. Use imagination to create your decks and battle games in 1v1 and 2v2 modes.

fields.name: The Occupation
fields.description: The Occupation is a fixed-time, investigative thriller set in North West England on Saturday 24th October, 1987.

fields.name: Beat Miner
fields.description: Mine and collect ore blocks to the rhythm of your music in procedurally generated caves. Featuring many levels and different gameplay modes, Beat Miner will challenge your mining reflexes!

fields.name: Annwn: the Otherworld
fields.description: Annwn is an abstract stealth strategy game of tension and relief, across a series of mysterious procedural islands.

fields.name: Cannon Fire
fields.description: Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, in Multiplayer or Split-Screen mode for the best experience.

fields.name: Heaven's Vault
fields.description: Explore the lost ruins of the Nebula, read ancient inscriptions, and uncover a forgotten past in this narrative archaeological science-fiction adventure game from the creators of 80 Days.

fields.name: 蜜汁女孩 Juice Girl
fields.description: Something special to you as a gift. Click to playing the game and unlock all of the collections.

fields.name: Controllers Battery Indicator
fields.description: A simple and handy utility for monitoring the charge of Xbox controllers. In time will warn about the discharge of the battery. Doesn’t interfere with the gameplay. Doesn’t CPU load. Track battery capacity and predict long-term resource.

fields.name: Blush Blush
fields.description: You are responsible somehow for a curse that befalls 12 unfortunate hawt dudes. Now you have to find them and break the curse with your love!!

fields.name: WAR PARTY
fields.description: Warparty is a real-time strategy game set in the stone-age era. Build your base, recruit and control a group of soldiers, fight and tame fierce dinosaurs and direct the flow of combat. Proper management of resources, skills and map awareness will lead you to victory.

fields.name: Corpse Party: Sweet Sachiko's Hysteric Birthday Bash
fields.description: Vengeful spirit Sachiko Shinozaki is having a birthday bash, and the lovable cast of damned souls from the Corpse Party series is invited! Join the revelers as they do their best to keep Sachiko happy and survive her twisted games in this midquel to Corpse Party and Corpse Party: Book of Shadows.

fields.name: KOMMERSANT
fields.description: KOMMERSANT is a game that will teach you how to think positively, carve your way to success, and finally sell that friggin vacuum. Buy KOMMERSANT now and become mind-bogglingly successful in no time!

fields.name: TheSecretGame2
fields.description: Explore the mysteries of TheSecretGame2. You are not alone and she is crying.

fields.name: DK Online
fields.description: DK Online is a 3D fantasy themed MMORPG that main focus is on large scale PvP oriented combat. You will be tasked with defending the world as a Dragon Knight, a powerful hero, only surpassed by the gods themselves.

fields.name: In Darkness
fields.description: In Darkness is a game that combines the essence of several genres like: role playing; hack n' slash; dungeon crawler; rogue like; and many others. It brings a challenging experience not only based on real time fighting, but also on how to search for information, and navigate labyrinths without map systems.

fields.name: Wequer
fields.description: Chess has evolved! Hatch units from eggs, make ranged attacks, cast dastardly spells, and take control of the board to win in Wequer.

fields.name: Way of the Orb
fields.description: Way of the Orb is the ultimate VR orb-blocking game! Kill monsters, upgrade powers, and hunt down bosses with your orb-blocking skills! Fast-paced engaging fights from start to finish! Choose between a staff, sword, or shield to defend yourself and defeat the monsters!

fields.name: Horse Riding Deluxe
fields.description: Explore a beautiful open world, full of horses and other animals. Or just enjoy the beautiful view while riding. In the world of Horse Riding Deluxe you and your horses have no limits. But train and care for your horses well because the various races will demand everything from you!

fields.name: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic
fields.description: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic is the ultimate real-time soviet-themed city builder tycoon game. Construct your own republic and transform a poor country into a rich industrial superpower!

fields.name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy / 逆転裁判123 成歩堂セレクション
fields.description: Become Phoenix Wright and experience the thrill of battle as you fight to save your innocent clients in a court of law. Play all 14 episodes, spanning the first three games, in one gorgeous collection.

fields.name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two
fields.description: You and your friend are trapped in a mystical world. As time ebbs away you must solve increasingly complex puzzles to escape. Cooperation is key as neither of you have the full picture! Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.

fields.name: Undead Horde
fields.description: Become a necromancer and raise the dead - Undead Horde is a necromantic action game with elements from RPG, strategy and hack'n'slash. Maraud through the lands of the living, raze their villages and steal their treasures. Ultimately you'll take over the whole kingdom of the living!

fields.name: 1 Screen Platformer
fields.description: The hardest 2,073,600 pixels you will ever play...

fields.name: Try To Fall Asleep
fields.description: John Herrin survived a horrible accident, damaging his brain and memory. Through falling asleep, he can rediscover his unfortunate past in his dreams, but because of his brain damage he'll start to see visions and hallucinations, and falling asleep won't be as easy as it seems at first...

fields.name: Levelhead
fields.description: Levelhead is a level building platformer with a challenging campaign for 1-4 players. Run, jump, and power-up through tons of levels in the handcrafted campaign, then build and publish levels for the world to play!

fields.name: Exocraft
fields.description: Design unique spaceships and build the ultimate space mining fleet as you team up to battle for resources and glory in this massively multiplayer action strategy set in an alien wasteland.

fields.name: Final Assault
fields.description: Final Assault is a WWII themed Action Strategy Game that capitalizes on the full power of Virtual Reality. Command massive ground battles as the skies erupt in dynamic dog fights and bombing runs. Combat requires quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight the battle, win the war!

fields.name: Outward
fields.description: No remarkable journey is achieved without great effort. Outward is an open-world RPG where the cold of the night or an infected wound can be as dangerous as a predator lurking in the dark. Explore the vast world of Aurai, embark on memorable adventures alone or with your friends.

fields.name: Pathogen-病原体
fields.description: "Pathogen" is a STG game base on real human body with little Rogue-Like element. You can propagate evolve infect and hide as different kinds of pathogens in human body.

fields.name: Murder Diaries: Ankara
fields.description: You have to find the exit without losing your sanity through fighting the monsters behind the locked doors...

fields.name: SHiRO 011
fields.description: Jump into fast-paced shooting action. Keep up with chaotic multiplayer battles. Hit your opponents, where it hurts, which is... technically everywhere. One shot, one kill - Every hit is deadly, so make sure you're the first to shoot!

fields.name: SUPER DRAGON BALL HEROES WORLD MISSION
fields.description: SUPER DRAGON BALL HEROES WORLD MISSION is a Tactical-Card game packed with exhilarating confrontation, deep card game strategy and a thrilling storyline taking place in the wide Dragon Ball Heroes universe!
fields.developer: Dimps Corporation, SAFARI GAMES Co., Ltd.
fields.publisher: Dimps Corporation, SAFARI GAMES Co., Ltd.

fields.name: Spellsword Cards: Demontide
fields.description: A unique solo quest card combat adventure with 500+ cards, drafting, roguelike and puzzle modes of play. The campaign features a unique MULTI-CLASSING SYSTEM and 50 boss fights plus hundreds of encounters.

fields.name: War Theatre
fields.description: Turn-based strategy with RPG elements. Take command of seven unique heroes, each with a specialization to change the course of every battle. Features single-player campaign and multiplayer modes available local or online.

fields.name: Unending Dusk
fields.description: Unending Dusk is a retro inspired beat ‘em up set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play solo or with up to 4 players and brawl your way through hordes of enemies. You play as an elite mercenary who fights against a dark force that has locked the Earth in a state of unending dusk.

fields.name: Joust
fields.description: Joust - casual slasher of knightly tournaments. Competition among players for the maximum passage of levels. Playing on the side of the Vikings or knights, boss fights. Become the best player in the world!

fields.name: Multiple Views Objects 多视体
fields.description: Hello,I come from another world. Inadvertently discovered human, in order to test the human ability, I uploaded this test to the human world,please complete the test to prove the human ability.

fields.name: PowerBeatsVR
fields.description: PowerBeatsVR is an intense rhythm-based VR fitness game with lots of boxing, smashing, and dodging. Enjoy the satisfying feeling of shattering everything, dodge obstacles, and move in harmony with energetic music. Unlock weapons with unique features and imprint your name on the leaderboards.

fields.name: Total Esports Action Manager
fields.description: YOU are the manager of a rookie Esports team! Only you can lead them to fame and glory! Recruit star players, balance your budget, train the team to be the best they can be, and become Esports League Champions! Work as a T.E.A.M.!

fields.name: Guilds Of Delenar
fields.description: Guilds of Delenar is a strategy RPG with a tactical turn-based combat system where you fight to build your guild from nothing into a guild known across the realm. Manage your heroes, their gear, what quests you do, and command them in battle.

fields.name: Supraland
fields.description: Try the demo! A mix between Portal, Zelda and Metroid. Explore, find secret upgrades, solve puzzles, beat up monsters, find new abilities that help you reach new places.

fields.name: Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice
fields.description: Carve your own clever path to vengeance in an all-new adventure from developer FromSoftware, creators of Bloodborne and the Dark Souls series. Take Revenge. Restore your honor. Kill Ingeniously.

fields.name: TetraLogical
fields.description: A turn-based slotting in / strategy game with a BIG twist!... Play either Solo, or Versus, against up to 3 CPU *or* Human players. Take turns to place your pieces onto the board, trying to score the maximum points/efficiency score that you can with your current piece.
the world's first digital elimination play!

fields.name: The Unintended Consequences of Curiosity
fields.description: The Unintended Consequences of Curiosity is a casual adventure puzzle game. A couch co-op that is equally playable solo. It packs a heart warming story and a charming world for everyone to explore.

fields.name: Bugs Must Die
fields.description: Shooting them with a machine gun, blasting them with missiles, dashing them with a vehicle, whipping them with an energy chain, or burning them with a napalm...No matter how you get it done, “ALIEN BUGS MUST DIE!

fields.name: The Forestale
fields.description: Help the fast like wind rabbit Alex save the world of the forest tale in the world's first platformer on the classic Doom (1993) engine. Challenge the monsters and mechanisms in the the fairy tale world after a fallen star came crashing down. Learn new skills, find tons of secrets and test your nerves!

fields.name: Zanki Zero: Last Beginning
fields.description: Explore the ruins, dungeons, and islands in this post-apocalyptic world through the POV of eight protagonists as they fight for survival and search for meaning in their never-ending cycles of life and death.

fields.name: Stardust VR
fields.description: Stardust is a VR action-relaxation game inspired by the classic Space Invaders arcade set in relaxing and charming world with Binaural 3d sound. Play solo, co-op, or PvP with a friend as you shoot, dodge, and create black-holes along your way to the top of the world leaderboard.

fields.name: Current
fields.description: Current is a puzzle game for a couple of hours, where you have to bring all the platforms one level.

fields.name: Tomb Towers
fields.description: The necromancer is hiding in a locked tomb tower. Solve puzzles, acquire keys and open doors until you catch-up to him.

fields.name: MinigolfPark VR
fields.description: Experience VR minigolf on a variety of courses. Play by swinging the club like you would in real life by using motion controllers. Fully supports Oculus Rift.

fields.name: CryoFall
fields.description: CryoFall is a Sci-Fi multiplayer survival game set on a forgotten planet in a distant future. Master technology, trading, crafting, industry, farming, exploration and more!

fields.name: Out of the Park Baseball 20
fields.description: Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB and the MLBPA, OOTP 20 is a baseball & strategy gaming fan's dream come true and the only game ever to win the Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE. Out of the Park Baseball 20 - Twenty Years of Excellence!

fields.name: Robot Wants It All
fields.description: Robot wants stuff! Go get it for him in this compilation of the metroidvania Robot Wants series, including an all-new Robot adventure!

fields.name: Tiny Tanks
fields.description: Tiny Tanks is a fun multiplayer party game about colorful tanks, an endless flood of game modes and absolute destruction mayhem. To top it all off, everything is "physically accurate".

fields.name: Redneck Kentucky and the Next Generation Chickens
fields.description: Redneck Kentucky and the Next Generation Chickens will introduce into the world of cartoony humor and intense action, giving you an exceptional replayability factor. Players have a great array of weapons at their disposal, they can also collect eggs which are located on the maps and activate special bonuses.

fields.name: HyperParasite
fields.description: Relentless rogue-lite shooter/brawler coming soon to a host near you. SNATCH, ZAP and REPEAT your way through a dystopian 1980's as a mysterious organism bent on world domination.

fields.name: Krampus is Home
fields.description: Sebastian is a teenager who is waiting for his parents to come back home on a cold Christmas night. Soon he realizes that there is something evil lurking around. Experience Sebastian 's journey into a Surreal world like no other.

fields.name: 7'scarlet
fields.description: The remote town of Okunezato is shaped like a crescent moon and shrouded in dark myths and legends. Take on the role of a brave young woman journeying into the unknown to uncover dangerous truths and locate her missing brother with her childhood friend.

fields.name: Outlaws of the Old West
fields.description: Outlaws of the Old West is a massively multiplayer survival MMO with a huge world, thousands of items and a modular building system. Survive the wild, build your own homestead, defeat villainous bandits and work with others to tame the Wild West.

fields.name: GhostGame
fields.description: GhostGame is the roguelike bullet hell game that puts your hand-mouse coordination to the test. Fight through hordes of enemies, gain powerful skills, acquire companions and defeat bosses to accomplish your ultimate mission.

fields.name: Sophont
fields.description: Sophont is an action packed science fiction first person shooter that relies on philosophical undertones as the primary focus of the plot.

fields.name: El Taco Diablo
fields.description: Hardcore Competitive Stand-still Arena FPS. It’s all about your accuracy and speed, there is no hand-holding. Compete on a global leaderboard and earn the #1 spot by killing endless waves of demonic Tacos and UFO’s. Discover a game that looks simple on the surface but hides a surprising amount of depth.

fields.name: Hypnospace Outlaw
fields.description: Greetings Enforcer, and thank you for enlisting in the Hypnospace Patrol Department! As the world falls into its slumber, Hypnospace becomes a bustling global village. These virtual streets aren't going to police themselves!

fields.name: The Armclaw Experiment
fields.description: Use your arm hooks to swing around a procedurally generated city in VR!

fields.name: Drone Striker
fields.description: An all new futuristic VR shooting game! Classic arcade shooting recreated in VR! A dire apocalyptic world! Surrounded by mecha insectoids! You take the role of Chris, a member of the special unit force called the Drone Strikers who needs to use his combat abilities to save what is left of humanity.

fields.name: Guardians Of The Past
fields.description: Guardians of the Past is a fast-paced arena brawler where you use gadgets to battle with or against your friends in a variety of arenas constructed by YOU! Build an array of launch-pads, fields of electrical chaos or even a sea of fire. With hundreds of combinations, every game is unique!

fields.name: Find your way
fields.description: "Find your way" is a third-person shooter in a wild west setting. You are in the Sayver City. For many years this city was a calm place of wild west. But now the gang of J.James that terrorized Great Plains comes to this place.

fields.name: Metori
fields.description: Strategize, build, and upgrade your fleet to defeat your enemies. All filtered through the design of classic arcade games.

fields.name: Korvux - Chapter 1
fields.description: Welcome to the Korvux kingdom. A fantasy world that is controlled by the Korvux clan. Today is the day where you apply for a membership, but not everything turns out as you hoped.

fields.name: ∀kashicforce
fields.description: ∀kashicforce is a puzzle-game-like, rhythm-game-like game where you input commands to use moves like in a fighting game. The goal is to crush your opponent to a pulp with an immense amount of blocks.

fields.name: Seirei
fields.description: Quietly execute the exorcism by capturing the enemy. If you are surrounded by enemies, you can not survive.

fields.name: Fight the Horror
fields.description: Fight the Horror is a multiplayer third person action role playing game with a horror theme.

fields.name: Grimshade
fields.description: Grimshade is a party-based role-playing game inspired by JRPG of the 90s, featuring a tactical turn-based combat system and a grim story of war and personal choices.

fields.name: Nova Drift
fields.description: Nova Drift distills the mechanical depth and strategy of an action RPG into classic arcade space combat. Control an endlessly evolving bio-mechanical ship, face legions of strange and deadly foes, and ride the wake of a dying star across the void.

fields.name: Monster Castle
fields.description: Simulating castle, Set up a monster army, Defend the evil empire

fields.name: Factory Town
fields.description: Build, automate, and optimize your own village on procedurally-generated 3D terrain. Use marble-run chutes, railways, logistic blocks, conveyor belts, and a variety of worker units to research useful new technology and keep your houses supplied with goods.

fields.name: 13 Cycles
fields.description: Try to figure out the most complex rogue-lite platformer ever, I dare you.

fields.name: Phase Shift
fields.description: A multi-mode instrument focused rhythm game, built to work with most popular PC compatible instruments. Use the native Midi support to play with real Drum or Keyboard modes. Every mode can play together in any combination in online or local multiplayer.

fields.name: BOSSGARD
fields.description: WHO’S THE BOSS? It’s finally you! One big, bad, player-controlled Boss goes against a team of Vikings, each with special abilities. Enter BOSSGARD, a hectic 1 versus 5 bossfight multiplayer game in which you get to crush your friends as THE BOSS.

fields.name: EggFight
fields.description: Welcome to EggFight! This is a game of fighting other eggs and accomplishing your mission first. Use various weapons to crash and disturb the other eggs!

fields.name: Don't Look Down
fields.description: The latest evolution in VR climbing. Flinging, racing, and smashing bots on your way to the top. Can you save the world from the robot you created?

fields.name: Super Chicken Catchers
fields.description: Super Chicken Catchers is a crazy 2v2 competitive game where cooperation and communication will be the key to victory! Split, regroup, pass the chicken, use your environment to flee, chase, fight your opponents and master the duo complementary abilities. Let's catch some chickens!

fields.name: Galaxy Trucker: Extended Edition
fields.description: Sign up to be a galaxy trucker today! An adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s award-winning board game is now on Steam. Already includes the ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES expansion!

fields.name: 암전:Blackout
fields.description: You will be lost in the labyrinthine house and chased by the devil in the blacked out house. You will experience tremendous fear, stress and madness playing this game and something invisible makes you get panicked and lost your mind.

fields.name: Hovership Havoc
fields.description: Hovership Havoc is a sci-fi twin stick shooter with 3rd person boss battles. Blast through rooms of a futuristic robotic factory filled with robot enemies. Equip your Hovership with randomly dropped abilities and upgrade your stats during each playthrough.

fields.name: Blind Souls
fields.description: Blind Souls is a first-person adventure game where you can see the world through the eyes of a dead painter.

fields.name: SurvivalZ Battlegrounds
fields.description: SurvivalZ Battlegrounds is a mini Battle Royale in a cubic world!

fields.name: Legends of Amberland: The Forgotten Crown
fields.description: The game is a classic western RPG inspired by the games from the 90s. Basically, it’s the kind of game I personally find missing nowadays. Light, fairy tale, epic, heroic, slightly humorous and without the need of endless grind to progress.

fields.name: Salio
fields.description: Take on this back-breaking platformer, face levels filled with obstacles and help a little creature reach its desire!

fields.name: Hunting fields of Jackals
fields.description: Drive various of real-world military vehicles that armed with real-world heavy weapons, racing and fighting against other players in a unique PVP+PVE survival mode.

fields.name: The Journey to Fairytales
fields.description: The Journey to Fairytales is a 3D puzzle-platformer adventure game. The primary character is a Sam, who losts in the world of fairy tales, and saves the world from evil fairy-tale characters.

fields.name: Duke of Defense
fields.description: Discover a world brimming with humor and interesting characters. You'll find yourself among overly observant villagers and egotistical wizards.

fields.name: ERI
fields.description: We control the ERI, this is self-learning artificial intelligence, which has to overcome 45 levels. The purpose of the test is to overcome obstacles and get to the portals, which will take us to more difficult levels.

fields.name: Neon Cat Tickler
fields.description: I'm a crazy cat and I love fun and food.

fields.name: HopeLine
fields.description: HopeLine is a classic theme of survival games. you need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold,And encounter beasts and zombies. Make a fire,Build shelters. Kill animals for meat, Or you need to kill other players to protect yourself. Do everything possible to survive.

fields.name: Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists ~Ateliers of the New World~ / ネルケと伝説の錬金術士たち ～新たな大地のアトリエ～
fields.description: Atelier 20th Anniversary Title An Atelier town built together with legendary alchemists. This title aims to combine the “slice-of-life” atmosphere of living in a town and collaborating with various characters and the exaltation that comes from successfully governing a town and expanding your world.

fields.name: Snooker 19
fields.description: Snooker 19 - The official videogame of World Snooker.

fields.name: Double
fields.description: Double is an action-quest game telling about a fight with a mental disorder by immersing in dreams. Choose your way and find out how this mystical story ends.

fields.name: egg is broken. heart is too.
fields.description: You are a chicken. Break into a restaurant kitchen and rescue your precious baby egg from the clutches of evil, hungry humans. You can do it. You have the power of motherly love.

fields.name: MatchyGotchy Z
fields.description: MatchyGotchy Z is a colorful digital pet game that combines idle clicker elements with a new take on pet-raising simulation: trainable personalities. All the nostalgia of those old virtual pets, fully adapted into a new desktop gaming experience.

fields.name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose
fields.description: Mobius. An idyllic world that lets people forget about the pain and problems of reality. Created by a sentient vocaloid program, μ (Mu), reality and fantasy have become blurred, allowing people to relive their high school years in bliss -- but just how real is a virtual happiness?

fields.name: Deicide
fields.description: Deicide is a sci fi/fantasy themed 3rd person team arena brawler featuring fast paced gameplay and unorthodox character designs. Grab two of your friends and play in 3 versus 3 last humanoid standing arena.

fields.name: Myha: Return to the Lost Island
fields.description: MYHA is a First Person Adventure game (Myst-like), part of a sci-fi series named The Black Cube (ASA: A Space Adventure...). Visit Myha, a moon in a far away solar system, and try to understand why you were teleported there.

fields.name: Shadow Brawlers
fields.description: Shadow Brawlers is a local party game in which players control cute, agile ninjas that hide in the shadows. Surprise your opponents by appearing suddenly from the background; attack and disappear.

fields.name: Love ritual
fields.description: Visit a beautiful fantasy city as an occult scientist where a forbidden ritual was performed. Unravel the mystery with your detective skills as the plot thickens around you, and all while two handsome advocates vie for your attention and your heart.

fields.name: GUNGRAVE VR
fields.description: GUNGRAVE is back! Undead assassin Beyond the Grave returns from a 14-year slumber ready to rumble in VR. Experience this classic series like never before as you step into Grave's boots to tackle waves of enemies and massive bosses with the gunman's legendary arsenal!

fields.name: Dimension Of Gameth
fields.description: Turn-Based RPG board-Game where you can bring varius of hero into your squad to fighting together against opponent.

fields.name: Dances with Butterflies VR
fields.description: Conduct clouds of Monarch butterflies in the forests of Mexico.

fields.name: Newfound Courage
fields.description: You're a young man named Alex who arrives in the cliffside town of Silverpine. Explore the town's many mysteries and meet its colourful townsfolk, while you grow closer to a kind-hearted local named Jake. Can the two of you save the town from the impending doom brewing inside the mysterious Vault?

fields.name: Where's Baby
fields.description: Where’s Baby is an asymmetrical multiplayer game pitting a baby sitter against WHAT IS THAT. WHY IS THAT KID SO FURRY! IS THAT A WEREWOLF? SHOULDN’T THEIR PARENTS HAVE MENTIONED THIS? HE BROKE THE TABLE! HE JUST TOUCHED IT AND IT EXPLODED!

fields.name: Windstorm / Ostwind - Ari's Arrival
fields.description: There are many new things to discover on Kaltenbach Ranch! Ride through exciting adventures on Windstorm's back in this video game based on the new movie!

fields.name: Xenon Racer
fields.description: It’s the year 2030, the era of flying vehicles. A one-off championship for wheel based vehicles has been organised, with cutting-edge electric cars boosted by Xenon gas. Drift through cities like Tokyo and Dubai as fast as you can and claim eternal glory!

fields.name: Privateers
fields.description: Privateers is a roguelite set in a fantasy nautical world. Players are set free into an archipelago where they can become a heroic navy captain or an evil pirate overlord depending on the choices that they make.

fields.name: AXIOM SOCCER
fields.description: Axiom Soccer represents the next generation of high-adrenaline digital sports, combining the best of real world ball games and third person shooters. Start scoring goals within minutes, and hone your shooting skills and team tactics to eventually play tournament matches in front of a live, virtual, in-game crowd.

fields.name: Beast Agenda 2030
fields.description: Beast Agenda 2030 is a Stealth, Gadgets and Hacking focused RPG with optional permadeath that encourages you to use your brain to complete missions in procedurally generated city districts. Inspired by Shadowrun SNES, Shadowrun Genesis, Metal Gear and Deus Ex.

fields.name: Pineview Drive - Homeless
fields.description: Join former Army soldier Miles Roberts as he wanders into the old estate at the bottom of Pineview Drive on a stormy night. From here begins a nightmare, from which it is necessary to escape.

fields.name: Grim Earth
fields.description: The Earth's looking a bit Grim, but so would you after 5000 years and countless alien invasions! Grab your spacesuit (the air's not so great any more) and go for an adventure in what is still a beautiful world.

fields.name: Conqueror's Blade
fields.description: Conqueror's Blade is a new free-to-play MMO tactical medieval warfare game. An ambitious hybrid of military strategy and deeply tactical third-person gameplay. Become the warlord of the greatest medieval civilization!

fields.name: 纸境英雄 Papercraft
fields.description: Papercraft is an independent game that beautifully combines Rouguelike, TBS and DBG elements. Heroes from legends holding different cards battle in TBS style. How to play the game is entirely up to you.

fields.name: Gunkid 99
fields.description: GUNKID 99 is a fast and frantic 2D arena-shooter that will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes. Craft your own unique play-style and develop crazy combos​ with numerous weapons and abilities at your disposal! Lay waste to endless hordes of enemies and get that top score on the Global Leaderboards!

fields.name: GUNGRAVE VR U.N
fields.description: Become the legendary undead gunman Beyond the Grave in this standalone sequel to GUNGRAVE VR featuring new levels, enemies, and play styles. Master Grave's punishing arsenal of attacks and abilities to mow down waves of mutant bad guys.

fields.name: Terrawurm
fields.description: Terrawurm is a fast paced singleplayer arcade game. Collect precious gems on the hostile surface of Terra; the landscape is dangerous but what lurks beneath is even worse… Grab as much as you can before you’re eaten by the Terrawurm!

fields.name: Velocity G
fields.description: Velocity G is a futuristic Zero G, 360 degree tunnel racing game set in the year 2086. Experience incredible high speed action as you race your way across exiting tracks, each with their own unique characteristics. Play single player against AI or split-screen with up to 4 players.

fields.name: Desktop Dynasties: Pro Football
fields.description: Desktop Dynasties: Pro Football is an 8-on-8 version of American Football where players must play on both offense and defense. Build your franchise over multiple seasons with full career play. Call the plays, pick the players, and guide your team to the championship.

fields.name: Dusk Diver 酉閃町
fields.description: This anime touch action game with stories base on Ximending. Players can carry on the phantom slaying adventures and fight along with guardians as story progresses. In game, you can experience the swiftness from the chain attacks and the fun of varies tactical skill combinations!

fields.name: Assassin's Creed® III Remastered
fields.description: Relive the American Revolution or experience it for the first time in Assassin's Creed® III Remastered, with enhanced graphics and improved gameplay mechanics. Also includes Assassin's Creed Liberation remastered and all solo DLC content.

fields.name: Origami Flight
fields.description: Origami Flight is a sidescrolling 2D shoot' em up where you control a paper airplane with a simple but challenging mission: to save the Origami World. Now you must beat 6 different stages with tons of enemies in order to save the Tsuru from the evil Origami Fox.

fields.name: DESERT KILL
fields.description: DESERT KILL is a roguelite top-down shooter where you have to destroy evil forces in the most brutal way!

fields.name: It's a Trap
fields.description: Can you survive the deadly traps in unexplored catacombs? Reclaim the legendary Crystal of Truth before the Nazis and you will see the world differently. Test your wisdom, courage and moves in a real challenge. Only in VR.

fields.name: B. Braun Aesculap Spine VR
fields.description: An interactive presentation of lumbar spinal surgery techniques with instruments produced by B.

fields.name: MMA Team Manager
fields.description: MMA team manager is the all new, face punching, body slamming manager game for the real MMA fans. Experience the life as a manager running your own team and leading the fighters to international glory in the cage.

fields.name: ULTIMATE HARDBASS DEFENCE
fields.description: SHOOT. SURVIVE. DANCE HARDBASS.

fields.name: Artificial Mansion
fields.description: When Reuben inherits his uncle's mansion, the last thing he expects is to find are sentient life-sized dolls that are capable of moving and talking. As if that isn't shocking enough, one of the dolls is a psychopathic killer who has her sights set on him! Will he survive or become another victim?

fields.name: Frostage
fields.description: In a kingdom far away, the light became extinct. There, lost in darkness, people started to afflict. There’s no more warmth, there’s no more light.

fields.name: Genius! NAZI-GIRL GoePPels-Chan ep1
fields.description: This is a slightly different history to the world we know. Having been appointed propaganda minister at the age of 14, the genius girl. Geri Goeppels, together with her private secretaries Rolly and Flute, is up to all sorts of secret maneuvers.

fields.name: DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition
fields.description: Combining seamless gameplay, FINAL FANTASY characters and breathtaking worlds from the past 30 years of the franchise, DISSIDIA® FINAL FANTASY® NT welcomes all gamers to the online battle arena with a new style of competitive gaming!
fields.developer: Square Enix, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
fields.publisher: Square Enix, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.

fields.name: Abberbury
fields.description: Enter the dungeon of a medieval castle full of traps, enemies, mysteries! Can you overcome all obstacles to justice?

fields.name: Knights of Tartarus
fields.description: Knights of Tartarus is a role-playing game where you enter the underworld to fight off a legendary order of knights and save the world. To have a chance, you will need monsters to teach you their spells, craft items, solve puzzles and even compete against your rival.

fields.name: Forebearers
fields.description: This city-building strategy game puts you as the chieftain of a tribe driven away from their homeland. Now you must rebuild and defend your tribe from both the elements and your old enemies.

fields.name: uFactory
fields.description: uFactory is a strategic factory building game where space and cash are limited, but production is not, and efficiency is king. Develop your production lines and rethink your layout as you race against the clock to meet your quotas.

fields.name: Dark Places
fields.description: Dark Places is a psychological single-player game set in a surreal world filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a daemon hunter desperately searching for answers and slowly descends into madness.

fields.name: Shop Manager : Video Game Tycoon
fields.description: In Shop manager: video game tycoon your uncle entrusts you his video game shop. Your goal is to make it profitable so that one day you can inherit your business. You will also need to hire staff to develop video games and then sell them in your store.

fields.name: The Love Boat - Second Chances
fields.description: Get ready for a new time management adventure with the Love Boat crew!

fields.name: Tank Royale
fields.description: Survive in tank battle! Or join with your friend to fight others! Battle, collect and customize your own tank!

fields.name: Riftwalker
fields.description: Riftwalker is a rogue-like tower defense in a world consumed by darkness, featuring rich backstory and endless, detailed procedural levels. You play the role of a riftwalker in a scouting party sent to investigate a nearby missing star, but find more than you were expecting - a civilization, or rather, what's left of it.

fields.name: 夏荷 | Summer Lotus
fields.description: Summer Lotus, a derivative play of campus love With the arrival of summer vacation, the male protagonist applied for a summer job, and naturally met our beautiful girls by the sea. Then an interesting love story happened.

fields.name: Himno
fields.description: Himno is a peaceful, 2D platformer game with an infinite number of beautiful procedurally generated maps. Take a breath, and relax.

fields.name: To Catch a Monkey
fields.description: The test monkeys have escaped the lab! You must catch the furry fiends before the professor finds out. Chase them into traps with the tools you have at your disposal -- massive explosions and fiery death.

fields.name: 假如我是人工智能 Big Brother Is Shaping You
fields.description: It's a serious game about AI, PRISM, big data, privacy, and free speech.

fields.name: Monkeys & Dragons
fields.description: Jack and Lana just started their honeymoon, when Jack was kidnapped by a sorcerer. Lana decides to take matters into her own hands. She becomes an adventurer, completes quests and solves dangerous puzzles. However, there was something she wasn't prepared for...

fields.name: Brrrainz: Feed your Hunger
fields.description: An adventure strategy game with some RPG elements. Explore the vast territories of 1960s America, survive in a hostile world, improve your skills, loot, use tactics, and manage your horde in the wacky world of Brrrainz.

fields.name: Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight
fields.description: Grab the control yoke of a warplane and jump into the battlefields of World War 2 in this thrilling combat flight action game. In each of the campaigns for USA, Great Britain, USSR, Germany and Japan you will assume the role of a pilot and squadron leader of an elite air force unit.

fields.name: Jack & the creepy Castle
fields.description: This cool, creepy Jump’n’Jump game will make you jump higher, jump farther, jump harder! Be strong. Be crazy. Be Jack!

fields.name: TAPSONIC BOLD
fields.description: MEET POPULAR RHYTHM ACTION GAME 'TAPSONIC' SERIES NOW ON STEAM!

fields.name: Willowbrooke Post | Story-Based Job Management Game
fields.description: Take care of your parents’ post office following their unexpected departure and return to your childhood home in the quaint, countryside village of Willowbrooke. Manage the establishment for a year, while becoming a part of the local community, brimming with colourful and curious characters.

fields.name: Wheel Travel
fields.description: Wheel Travel is offroad-RPG. You can travel with customized car.

fields.name: Vanguard: Normandy 1944
fields.description: In Vanguard: Normandy 1944 players fight with their squad to survive in hardcore multiplayer combat for historic D-Day objectives on real battlefields.

fields.name: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity
fields.description: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity is a dynamic and competitive multiplayer online Arena Brawler, in which 2 to 8 players fight in free-for-all or in team. Each player chooses his Hero, his spells, and jumps into battle. Pick up Halzae's essence in the arenas to fire up your spells, and fulfill the objectives.

fields.name: Burnout Drift
fields.description: Are you a drift master? Prove your skills in Burnout Drift!

fields.name: Goblin's Shop
fields.description: This is a pixel-art simulation game in which the player runs a shop, together with RPG adventures. In Goblin’s Shop, the player is a goblin who has been bullied by humans and he always wants to get it even. Unfortunately, however, Mr. Goblin realizes that he is too weak to beat any human soldier.

fields.name: Unheard
fields.description: What if you could hear every word spoken at the scene of a crime? “Acoustic Detectives” wanted for testing our new device! Return aurally to crime scenes and use the voices you hear to identify potential suspects and solve the mysteries. What is it that’s connecting these seemingly unrelated cases?

fields.name: Cattle Call: Hollywood Talent Manager
fields.description: A (quite literally) one-of-a-kind, decades-spanning, management/simulation/RPG game that puts you in the hot seat of a Hollywood talent agent.

fields.name: Vignettes
fields.description: Vignettes is a unique exploration game without text or characters, where objects shapeshift as you spin them around to wander through a kaleidoscope of different moods and settings.

fields.name: Bassline Sinker
fields.description: Bassline Sinker is a Shooter / Bullet hell that responds to your music. Add in your favourite .mp3 or .wav files and take to the high Cs, battling through the waves of creatures also using the power of music. Unlock and equip more weapons and enter the reef again!

fields.name: Bubbles the Cat
fields.description: Leap, blast and bob your way through over a hundred levels of cute platforming action in BUBBLES THE CAT!

fields.name: Cliché - Critical Change
fields.description: Raise Muki, a muscular girl with the heart of a maiden in any way you want! Guide her so she can be with her beloved prince! Will things go horribly wrong, or horribly right? It is all up to you!

fields.name: Love Thyself - A Horatio Story
fields.description: In a society where everyone is a clone of the Emperor, can you survive long enough to find out who you truly are? Try out the brand new visual novel set in the Endless Universe!

fields.name: Tactics & Strategy Master 2:Princess of Holy Light（圣光战姬）
fields.description: -Beautiful girls -A retro style turn-based wargame -Nearly 200 missions of varying difficulty wait for you -200 different weapons -A highly liberal game of chess -A combination of many active and passive skills -Supports Traditional Chinese, and English

fields.name: Trap Shrine / 女装神社
fields.description: The Goddess was a Crossdresser?! The enshrined deity turned out to be a cross dressing Goddess that was sealed to... marry ME?! The cross dressing legend starts here!

fields.name: Unrest Indigo
fields.description: The idea that all feelings have a single definition is about to change. Unrest Indigo is a first person game of the horror genre that explores the dark depths of a great change.
