fields.name: Void Mine
fields.description: A mining space station doesn't respond to communications. An investigator tries to find out what happened to the crew. Void Mine is a zero-gravity narrative action adventure full of danger and mystery.

fields.name: ArmZ VR
fields.description: Think quick, but shoot quicker in this insanely dynamic wave shooter, where you operate a huge battle mech. Defend the city gates at all costs or else doomed creatures from the bottom of the post-apocalyptic hell will break through the gates and wipe the last human habitats off the face of the earth.

fields.name: TrivaTune
fields.description: TrivaTune is a music Trivia game where users compete in a multiplayer world to prove they are the music king, you will be asked questions with multiple choice options and possibly even get an audio question where a track is played to you and you have to guess who the artist is or what the title or album are and maybe even the release year

fields.name: NOLO HOME
fields.description: NOLO HOME is a streaming software that allows you to play SteamVR games with your standalone VR headset and Gear VR. For room-scale VR titles, NOLO CV1 VR controller is highly recommended.
fields.developer: 北京凌宇智控科技有限公司
fields.publisher: 北京凌宇智控科技有限公司

fields.name: Astrox Imperium
fields.description: Climb from your cryo-pod and enter the Void... Astrox Imperium is a space based rpg that offers familiar game play in an open-world universe. With tons of ships, upgrades, and options, being lost in space might just be fun.

fields.name: SCUOS
fields.description: SCUOS is a puzzle game where you need to reproduce patterns from one board on another. How many levels can you pass?

fields.name: Terror In The Atomic Desert
fields.description: Terror In The Atomic desert is a first person horror puzzle game made as a homage to 1960s B-movies.

fields.name: Bow to Blood: Last Captain Standing
fields.description: Become a Captain! Fly your ship and command your crew as you compete to become Champion in a winner-takes-all reality show. Build relationships and plot betrayals to avoid getting voted off the season and become the last captain standing. Optional VR support.

fields.name: Anime Pixel Girls
fields.description: Anime Pixel Girls is a game just like mosaic of individual elements that you need to assemble into an interesting single picture and then it comes to life.

fields.name: 1001st Hyper Tower
fields.description: 1001st Hyper Tower is a rogue-lite FPS in arabian cyberpunk world. Face very fast vertical gameplay and cunning enemies on your way to the top! Climb different districts of procedurally generated tower. Every structure is completely destructible!

fields.name: Save Thine Kingdom
fields.description: A light-hearted journey of a King trying to save his Kingdom from the malevolent Doombringer.

fields.name: Fantasy Blacksmith
fields.description: You are a blacksmith in the world of the sword, magic and war, in which any blacksmith who knows how to make even the simplest swords is in demand. You start off as a poor unskilled blacksmith, but in time you will gain experience and improve to achieve wealth, fame and power, and change this world!

fields.name: Block Puzzle!
fields.description: Block Puzzle is a strategy / puzzle game with innovative mechanics that will surprise anyone who plays it. With 5 different game modes you will not get tired of it in a long time.

fields.name: Dark Gnome
fields.description: Retro gaming at its best! Join the cantankerous pixel art gnomes as they raid their neighbors in round-based combat. Chock-full of dark humor and loads of quirky characters, this RPG won‘t let you go. To battle! Play now!

fields.name: The Gameshow
fields.description: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest. Now, surviving is your only objective.

fields.name: Down to Hell
fields.description: Down to hell is a dynamic slasher in which lone swordsman must face the hordes of hellish demons. Moreover Down to Hell will give you truly Heavy F’N Metal experience.

fields.name: Puzzle Out VR
fields.description: Puzzle Out VR is an atmospheric tangram-style puzzle game in space where you need to put puzzle pieces in the right place before the moving alien wall reaches you!

fields.name: Talk to Strangers
fields.description: ----- Hello, and welcome to Sunny Mornings™! ----- Talk to Strangers is a game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.

fields.name: Heroes of Fortunia
fields.description: Heroes of Fortunia is an online multiplayer hack ‘n slash game, in which players strive to create their own dungeons, filled with monsters & traps, while at the same time attacking other players’ dungeons in an attempt to beat them.

fields.name: Brainmelter Deluxe
fields.description: Melt your brain with this twisted take on the platform genre.

fields.name: A meadow Piece
fields.description: This is a meadow simulator with slightly different flowers. Either just watch the flowers grow. Or defend yourself against strange aliens. Actively intervene in the development of the meadow. Play with your friends, either as a team or against each other.

fields.name: Trinoline All Ages Version
fields.description: One summer day, Shun Nanami meets a girl who is the spitting image of his dead sister. She turns out to be a high-tech android indistinguishable from a human being. So begins a touching tale in a world where androids and human beings coexist.

fields.name: Akabeth Tactics
fields.description: Akabeth Tactics is a turn-based tactical puzzle game where you play as the vampire Liel, trying to infiltrate into King Cassius' castle and usurpe the throne. Solve challenging positioning puzzles through fixed levels, in a gothic tone.

fields.name: Bedtime Blues
fields.description: They say that child’s imagination is pure and innocent, but what if said imagination becomes a nightmare? Enter the pixelate world of a young, troubled mind, and survive the night!

fields.name: The Yellow Quiz
fields.description: The Yellow Quiz - a fun multiplayer game for parties that turns your smartphone into a wireless game controller.

fields.name: Creatures Inc
fields.description: Creatures Inc throws you and your friends into a world infested by Creatures. Battle to survive in a valley where you can capture and tame creatures.

fields.name: King of Retail
fields.description: Dive right into your career as owner of the newest store in town. Buy and sell the right articles. Build and design your store space. Manage your staff, and take good care of your customers. Plan the perfect marketing scheme, and become the most popular store. But the devil is in the detail.

fields.name: Super Chains
fields.description: Experience the new challenges designed to perplex, delight and unwind the mind. Super Chains combines a variety of puzzles that everybody can enjoy.

fields.name: A Bewitching Revolution
fields.description: A Bewitching Revolution is a first-person adventure game about a communist witch living in a cyberpunk city. Use magic to help the city's residents organise collective forms of power and resistance!

fields.name: Gems of Magic: Lost Family
fields.description: Peaceful and really magical Match 3 adventure for a whole family! This magic and beautiful game allow you to take a look at Enchanted Forest, were many magical creatures live peacefully. The bright game without violence, quite simple on start, but challenge after first levels! Suitable for kids and adults.

fields.name: Cubicity: Slide puzzle
fields.description: Buddy, you’re in the cubic world! It has its own laws and rules, so choose a character and start solving the puzzles!Make up a figure from the characters, leading each of them the shortest way!

fields.name: Gyro Boss DX
fields.description: Dodge an endless assault of weapons as you orbit around the boss on a fixed circle, it's not as easy as it looks. Can you secure bragging rights as the best space pilot to bite the dust against the alien menace?

fields.name: Evil Maze 2 | 惡魔迷宮 2
fields.description: This is a retro random strategy ARPG. Rich hidden elements, random props, random magic, random maze It's a different experience for everyone to play games.

fields.name: Super Realistic Autocross
fields.description: Super Realistic Autocross is an arcade-style racing simulator that brings the fun of Solo Autocross to your computer. Play dozens of tracks that hone your driving skills and teach the basics of Autocross. Experience the most super realistic cone physics ever created when you go on a cone killing rampage.

fields.name: Stupid Cupid
fields.description: Help Cupid get back in Venus’ good graces in this VR game! Use his bow and arrow to balance the natural order by helping animals mate, or in some cases, culling the overpopulation. Challenge your skills and accuracy in different locations and seasons.

fields.name: Metaloid : Origin
fields.description: Metaloid: Origin is an fast-paced gun’n'run 2D platformer. Take on the role of one out of three android warrior's known as “Predator” and dash through 9 different levels in order to save their planet from an robot army led by Lucian Corp, whom invade their planet and exploit the planetary resources to fuel their galactic war efforts.

fields.name: Discharge
fields.description: Lead your drones into an epic battle for the last iridium on the planet.

fields.name: I hate this game
fields.description: I hate this game is a logic game, where gameplay changes every level. Solve crazy puzzles and use forgotten functions of your PC! Be attentive, interact with everything that you see on the screen.

fields.name: Drafting Tales
fields.description: Become a well-known and successful author in this 2D isometric simulation game!

fields.name: ShineG In Bumpercat
fields.description: Shine brought a Nekomusume’s world through a cat's ear headdress and started a new battle.

fields.name: Dance of Death: Du Lac & Fey
fields.description: Victorian London is in peril. Jack the Ripper stalks the streets, tempting immortal Arthurian heroes, Sir Lancelot Du Lac and Morgana Le Fey, back to English shores. Will they arrive in time to end his reign of terror?
fields.developer: Salix Games Ltd, Tea Clipper Games Ltd
fields.publisher: Salix Games Ltd, Tea Clipper Games Ltd

fields.name: Fenimore Fillmore: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs
fields.description: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs was one of the last classic point & click adventure release in 1996, now you can play it again in this wonderful remastered version with enhanced graphics up to 4k.

fields.name: Jigsaw Masterpieces
fields.description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces" is an easy-to-play traditional jigsaw puzzle. A lot of DLC is releasing, such as beautiful landscape of the world, masterpieces of painting, popular cartoon characters, dogs and cats. You will surely find the your best puzzle!

fields.name: Skyworld: Kingdom Brawl
fields.description: All is fair in love and VR! Friends turn foe as you set foot in the VR battle arenas of Kingdom Brawl. From the creators of Arizona Sunshine, set in the universe of Skyworld, comes an action-packed real-time multiplayer game, exclusively for VR.

fields.name: Oops!!! Puzzles!!!
fields.description: We offer you a puzzle game. The meaning of the game – making a mosaic pattern that you want to add up from a variety of fragments of different shapes. The greatest interest in this game will cause thrill-seekers, as it contains scary pictures (horror).

fields.name: Nanobotic
fields.description: Nanobotic is a free to play first person shooter multiplayer online battle arena extravaganza (FPS MOBA). In Nanobotic you can craft weapon elements on the spot and switch between them with ease, you can also craft different types of artificially intelligent (AI) minions and control their actions.

fields.name: Lilycle Rainbow Stage!!!
fields.description: ★The Lilycle Yuri Drama CD series comes to life, featuring an all-star cast, now in a fully-visual adventure game. While Lilycle is a must read for any dedicated yuri fan, it contains a selection of nice and easygoing stories to warm the hearts of one and all!

fields.name: Abrakadaboom
fields.description: Face your friends as powerful wizards fighting in thematic arenas in this multiplayer party game that combines fun and intensity along with a gameplay that is both easy to learn and rich of subtleties. Get ready for lots of laughs and mayhem!

fields.name: Pedal-Olli 3D
fields.description: When every other extreme sport is not extreme enogh. Select your character and perform stunts to cause as much mayhem as possible in different levels.

fields.name: Endless Maneuver
fields.description: Cool and addictive game in which you can compete with other players on two difficulty levels.

fields.name: 祭品的逆襲 The Counterattack Of Sacrifice
fields.description: Hello, everyone, this horror game is made using Unity 3D Game Engine / Asset Store, Turbosquid material / mixamo character module / copyright-free tracks. Game Description: Explore the game world through the use of the first person perspective. The scene blends Western and Oriental elements.

fields.name: Grave Keeper
fields.description: You are The Bounty Hunter and walked into The Forbidden Stronghold. It is taken by The Skeleton King. To collect all treasures you must kill him first.

fields.name: One Finger Death Punch 2
fields.description: The world's fastest brawler is back. Experience cinematic kung-fu in the most epic stickman fighter ever made. Staying true to the original, you play with only two buttons. Every press matters, do not button mash!

fields.name: Haunting Hour
fields.description: Cooperate in this Cross-platform Multiplayer Virtual Reality Escape Room to escape the Witch’s Castle. Pit your wits against twisted puzzles and crazy challenges as you and your fellow imprisoned ghosts race against time. There's only an hour until the Haunting Hour begins, will you make it out?

fields.name: Death Mark
fields.description: A strange rumor is spreading through the shadows of Tokyo's H City: a mysterious disfigurement has been appearing on the bodies of certain individuals. Anyone who receives the Mark will rapidly die of unknown, horrifying causes. The countdown to death has already begun...

fields.name: GeminiArms
fields.description: GeminiArms is a side scrolling 2D shoot'em up.

fields.name: Stellar Sphere
fields.description: Stellar Sphere is a scifi sport game, an action game, and a space game mainly set in zero gravity, where the player must find a sphere and throw it against the active wormhole. Winning the game will need a combination of skills and using the best tactics in order to survive.

fields.name: Agent 9
fields.description: Experience the action-packed life of Agent 9 and bring an end to the world's most dangerous villains. Explore vibrant vistas and enemy-packed enclaves by sneaking or shooting to success! Agent 9 is a hardcore FPS created by the one-man indie developer: Noodle Games.

fields.name: Truth: Disorder III — Gemini / 真実：障害III - 双子座
fields.description: Truth: Disorder - Gemini is a strange story about two twin girls: Mei and Aoi. Despite external similarity, their characters are absolute opposites.

fields.name: Cop Academy
fields.description: Cop Academy is a VR party game where two teams battle it out through a series of challenges. Cooperate with your teammates or ruin your opponents' game...or both! Earn the most points to prove yourself and help your team join the ranks of Otterwa's police department, the proud graduates from Cop Academy.

fields.name: Medieval Towns
fields.description: A multiplayer game in medieval setting about survival, diplomacy, building of towns and conquests. Try to survive in wild nature, gather resources, create or join clan, build town and fight for glory or resources!

fields.name: Infinite Chili Sauce  无尽的辣酱
fields.description: Casual and relaxed placement game, hang your time in your leisure time and build your own chili sauce empire.

fields.name: Arctic Fleet
fields.description: The Arctic doesn’t forgive your mistakes. You need to come up with a good strategy to make the business successful. It sounds hard; however, it is not that easy to scary you, and you accept the challenge, don’t you?

fields.name: Pocoman
fields.description: Pocoman will keep you on the edge of your seat or banging your head against the wall, with it's unique hand crafted levels filled to the brim with challenge. It's a sokoban game for families of all ages in all reaches of the universe.

fields.name: Super Crome: Bullet Purgatory
fields.description: In the dark depths of space, an unknown threat called Purgatory has begun to consume colonies throughout the cosmos. As solar systems are engulfed by this mysterious force, the fate of civilization is at stake.

fields.name: The Morrigan
fields.description: Step into this world of beautiful stylised graphics and explore striking, handcrafted environments - torch in one hand, big axe in the other. Built exclusively for VR.

fields.name: Terrible Laboratory
fields.description: A pretty and talented scientist, Konica Yaegaki, must earn money to save her laboratory from competing companies and peers who seek to destroy her reputation. However, she won't go down that easily. Follow Konica in this Slice of Life RPG as she tries to save her laboratory!

fields.name: EF Universe: Reclaiming the World
fields.description: An idle game with a collectible card theme. Open booster packs, collect cards, build an elaborate stat chain, manage 6 different currencies, battle your way across 6 different regions, and reclaim the world!

fields.name: Magic Mouse
fields.description: Magic Mouse is an action-adventure top-down dungeon crawl set in a fantasy world where the player fights their way through dangerous enemies, overcomes powerful bosses and survives perilous traps all while honing magical powers.
fields.developer: Reed Mosby, Riley Shanley, Luke Fritz, Brian Fitzgerald, Nicholas Herink, Caraline Aldis, Karena Williams, Sam Fadare, Eric Bodreau
fields.publisher: Reed Mosby, Riley Shanley, Luke Fritz, Brian Fitzgerald, Nicholas Herink, Caraline Aldis, Karena Williams, Sam Fadare, Eric Bodreau

fields.name: Space Captain McCallery - Episode 2: Pilgrims in Purple Moss
fields.description: Space Pirate Captain McCallery explores a mysterious ruin in an alien swamp in search of treasure in this Low-Poly 3D Action-Adventure game.

fields.name: Wall Street Tycoon
fields.description: Wall Street Tycoon is a business simulation game where you’re the CEO of a new investment company. Your job is to grow the company, hire employees, and manage the business!

fields.name: 3D Custom Lady Maker
fields.description: A custom character creator with a tendency towards the titillating. Create and customize the 3D anime-style lady of your dreams!

fields.name: Zombie Apocalypse
fields.description: Improve your weapons or buy new weapons to survive in this action-packed atmosphere of zombie limbs and blood! Use equipment, special powers and weapons add-ons!

fields.name: Lingua Fleur: Lily
fields.description: 'Lingua Fleur: Lily' is focused on friendship, love, troubles, efforts, and confusions between girls. Made with illustrations, animations, and original music, this story tells of the protagonist Yuyi Wu's secret, one very different from an 'ordinary' girl. Told in a gentle and ordinary style.

fields.name: Raid on the Ruhr
fields.description: For PC and VR. Time to blow up some Dams! Fly and shoot your way through the rivers of the Ruhr Valley while reliving this incredible feat of daring, brilliance and skill.

fields.name: Black Salt Coreuption
fields.description: Black Salt Coreuption is a one-on-one 3D arena fighting game that allows complete freedom of movement around the arena rather than 3D fighters doing combat on a 2D plane. The Black Salt Coreuption 3D arena fighting game series also combines two action properties.

fields.name: Crossroads: Roguelike RPG Dungeon Crawler
fields.description: Crossroads is a hardcore roguelike RPG dungeon crawler stylized as a card game. Create your hero and go to the adventures to gain levels, loot new gear, learn different spells and finally complete your quest!

fields.name: Shadow Legend VR
fields.description: Shadow Legend is an exploration-RPG exclusively designed for VR where you play as the Grand Master of the Knights Templar in a story-driven medieval crusade. Freely explore densely filled worlds and use your sword, bow, and magic skills to save your kingdom from the destruction of Lord Adaroth.

fields.name: Donald VS Martians
fields.description: Donald saves the universe!

fields.name: All Of ZHEM 僵尸们
fields.description: You as a agent against hundreds of zombies that can run and climb and always be chasing after you till you become one of Zhem. Navigate through 3 different maps to wipe out every single one of Zhem.

fields.name: Super Phantom Cat
fields.description: A retro-casual platformer game! No matter who you are! Get your cat ears ready, BRING IT ON! Set off on the crazy journey to rescue your sister!

fields.name: Urban Trial Playground
fields.description: This new instalment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California, mixing in even crazier tricks, flips and combos than ever before. It’s a game of speed, balance and style!

fields.name: Fantasy Smith VR
fields.description: FantasySmithVR is a stimulation-type VR game. Players can experience how to make a weapon, and how to interact with characters or creatures in the shop. The fantasy world setting makes the forging more interesting, magic potion and floating crystals virtually engage players in an incredible magic world.

fields.name: Bookend
fields.description: Harness your child-like imagination to interact with the pop-up book, “The Little Witch”. Explore the book's world and help the protagonist, the little witch, Abigail, as she's pursued by an angry mob trying to stop her mission that could either mean saving the world—or ending it.

fields.name: Full Of Love
fields.description: Classic puzzle play, you and your brother will love it.

fields.name: Waves of the Atlantide
fields.description: A finite world with infinite resources. Defeat your opponents before the world collapses under your empire in this epic Battle Royale 4X RTS! A tidal wave is putting an end to this continent, will you make it through?

fields.name: Backbone: Prologue
fields.description: Backbone: Prologue is the demo of an upcoming noir-inspired detective adventure. As raccoon private eye Howard Lotor, sniff out clues, collect evidence, interrogate witnesses, and explore beautiful pixel art version of dystopian Vancouver, BC.

fields.name: Project Downfall
fields.description: An overdose of reality can have dire consequences… Descend down the rabbit hole and embrace your Downfall in a trippy, brutal and stylized adventure.

fields.name: The Secret of Gillwood
fields.description: The gods don´t hear the prayers of Gillwood, so it’s now up to you to find out why! The Secret of Gillwood is an single player game with a small open world set in a dark and mysterious world. The player takes control over the most faithful Guardian of the gods.

fields.name: Circle Rally Party
fields.description: Circle Rally Party is a 1 to 4 players local multiplayer party game with mini games about doing donuts with cars. Use your car's unique attack at the right time, and collect power-ups to improve your odds. Traffic rules do not apply!

fields.name: Ritual of the Moon
fields.description: Ritual of the Moon is a 28 day long multi-narrative game exploring loneliness, power, and healing. Once discovering her powers, The Earth’s Council exiles the witch to the moon to live out the rest of her life looking at the earth - and the woman she loves - that she can never go back to.

fields.name: Bullynoid
fields.description: Bullynoid - This is a colorful breakout game in which you have to play for a bully! Beat the faces of passersby and onlookers! Take away their money! All of what sometimes you want to do in reality is now available in the game! Unlock new Freaky characters!

fields.name: Hunger Apartment （蚀狱）
fields.description: This is Hunger Apartment, a place feeding you, warming you, and satisfying all your fantasies.

fields.name: RelayCars
fields.description: Welcome to RelayCars®: The New Way to Experience Cars™ Step inside our room-scale Showroom and view product accurate vehicle models as part of your car research and shopping experience! Select vehicles from the expanding model library and place the vehicles from one of three designated spaces on the showroom floor.

fields.name: WildKids
fields.description: This is a very serious and serious game, so in addition to the time still. Magic elements are also there! If you don't have enough nerves and a heart-like eye, be careful of the maliciousness from the WildKids! The content of this game is too real, don't imitate it easily!

fields.name: Havocado
fields.description: Havocado is a silly hyper-speed multiplayer physics fighting game; shoot, punch, drive, and use magic to knock the other players off in a multitude of locations and scenarios.

fields.name: Geeksos
fields.description: Survive in a city controlled by a game corporation. Residents have to buy DLC for every unfinished product, developers are forced to make endless sequels, and lootboxes are now sold even at the grocery store. Stop the madness or join it in the cybernetic stealth-shooter Geeksos.

fields.name: Dark Sauce
fields.description: Take gold from the dragon, and not become a barbecue. Colorful cubic platformer about pig and...

fields.name: Rules of The Mafia: Trade & Blood
fields.description: Criminal gangs and their conflicts are waiting for you in our game Rules of The Mafia: Trade & Blood! Control a mafia clan and keep the whole city under control.

fields.name: OSIRIS
fields.description: Dark history about OSIRIS corporation, which perform experiments in the field of teleportation of human souls to the Heaven on the artificial planet G6. Inspired by Dark Dubstep music.

fields.name: Final_SIM
fields.description: Welcome to the Final Simulation, a simulation catered to your fears. Short and Shocking. Simply complete it to win.

fields.name: Flash Point
fields.description: A solo developer's dream project, Flash Point is a new, upcoming Early Access FPS game with a lot to offer to the shooter audience. Flash Point accomplishes the old school FPS game feel.

fields.name: De'Vine: Card Battles
fields.description: As enchantments that bind powerful creatures to cards begin to corrode... Hell is breaking loose! Over 300 unique CARDS to collect! Fast paced CARD BATTLE system! NO RNG. NO CARD DRAWS. PURE STRATEGY!

fields.name: Piczle Lines DX+α
fields.description: Super-addictive logic-puzzle hit game Piczle Lines DX finally available in its ultimate form!

fields.name: Seek Girl
fields.description: This is a "collection game" which unlocks "collection" girls by tapping cute little people who jump out of the hole. The unlocked girl will be sealed in a bottle and you can meet her again at any time. Every beautiful girl has her own unique movements and voice to make you have a more authentic experience!

fields.name: K.O.M.A
fields.description: Get inside the character's mind!

fields.name: Magnibox
fields.description: A puzzle game about magnets designed for human brains.

fields.name: Cube Defense
fields.description: You left alone camping in the mountains ... But during this time a virus has invaded the country and a cubic horde is heading towards you!

fields.name: Jumping Master(跳跳大咖)
fields.description: Jumping Master is a innovative casual competitive game fully merged with classic gameplay of mushroom game. It aims to help us revisit the classic mushroom game in our chlidhood.

fields.name: Tactical Control
fields.description: Tactical Control: the 7-minute wargame. Simplified strategy with minimalist graphics and quick, intense games. Play short matches against random opponents. Fight tense battles of stealth, anticipation and surprise. Win with strategy, deception and cleverness, not with reflexes and clicking speed.

fields.name: On Target VR Darts
fields.description: On Target VR Darts is a realistic physics-based darts simulation. Play a game of Freethrow or 301/501 versus AI in The Black Hat Tavern. This fully immersive VR darts experience is unlike anything you’ve ever experienced. Multiplayer with additional game modes coming soon!

fields.name: VireFit
fields.description: LOAD THE WORLD OF GREAT SPORT. Box, tennis and basketball try it in virtual reality. Get ready for the real training, practice strikes and throws, develop agility and accuracy, set records and compete with friends.

fields.name: Next Stop 3
fields.description: Margaret needs your help once again! You must repair the railway over 50 levels, build a sorting center and win in a billion-dollar escapade!

fields.name: GUIDE
fields.description: GUIDE was developed by Reframe Games Inc., a New Brunswick based studio that seeks to promote child and youth wellness through digital game software.

fields.name: Where the Bees Make Honey
fields.description: Where the Bees Make Honey tells a story about reflecting on different moments from a childhood, which are played and experienced from an adult perspective. At its core Where The Bees Make Honey is a narrative puzzle adventure game, with playable childhood moments filtered throughout.

fields.name: The Demon Crystal
fields.description: The Demon Crystal, produced in 1984 by YMCAT, achieved great success as the pioneer of the action RPG genre and became a nation-wide hit. The first game in a trilogy, it is known as a "legendary game.

fields.name: Xtreme League
fields.description: Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

fields.name: Fused
fields.description: NF-01, A Nanobyte who refers himself as Nigel, is spawned after a cascade failure within the Skystar System. His duty is to navigate through the system levels to fix the fuses, avoid the damaged shock traps and bring the system back online.

fields.name: INTERPOINT
fields.description: Interpoint is a first-person sci-fi mystery with elements of psychological horror. A secret organization made the discovery of parallel worlds. You are Harry G., a scientist, who took part in a project that was supposed to benefit humanity.

fields.name: Aussie Battler Tanks
fields.description: Multiplayer ww2 tanks fps and 3d shooter game, not pay to win.10 ww2 tanks, 2 to 12 players with hassle free multiplayer hosting on cloud network , 3 game modes and 7 ww2 maps.Physics tracks and hit point damage system with AP and HE shells.Not pay to win with expencive ammo unlike some other tank game.

fields.name: Vasilis
fields.description: Vasilis is a hand-drawn adventure game. The main character – Vasilis, lost her husband – Peter, in the rebellious city center. The city is in riots for a long time and almost everyday something burns or someone dies.

fields.name: War of Three Kingdoms
fields.description: This is a strategy type game, players can capture the city, the final one continent, in this process, players can collect hundreds of heroes, different heroes have different skills and abilities, you can also train the hero, build a strong army.

fields.name: PiiSim
fields.description: This game with absurd humor. Pee in the toilet, break the toilet, washing machine, make a hole in the wall, piss the police, destroy the city.

fields.name: The Childs Sight
fields.description: See the word through the innocent eyes of a small child. Slowly unravel the story of what has happened, while you were laying in your crib, observing the world around you... Something’s may remain faded but one story sticks with you to this very day.

fields.name: Agartha
fields.description: Agartha is an puzzle platformer where you play various adventurers carving out their way through countless levels using very limited resources.

fields.name: Puttin' Around
fields.description: Ever wanted to experience life as a golf ball? Well now you can! In Puttin' Around, putt yourself across various custom physics-defying worlds! Enjoy friendship-ruining victories with custom maps and game types.

fields.name: Ordo Et Chao: New World
fields.description: Inspired by famed series like "The Settlers", "Battle for Middle-Earth", "Anno" and "Age of Empires", Ordo Et Chao is a solo-player strategy game combining elements of real time strategy, resource management and city building.

fields.name: Tsumi
fields.description: Tsumi is a small arena-type action game where you try to survive as many waves of monsters as you can. Slash your way through the foes and delve into some dark secrets of this world.

fields.name: Hentai NetWalk
fields.description: Hentai NetWalk is a network construction logic game, and what you need to do is to connect all the devices to the network.

fields.name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno (Chapter 3)
fields.description: Symploké: Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a classic point and click adventure set in a Spanish university and inspired in one of the most influential contemporary philosophers in the world. Play Chapter 3 ONLY if you got through Chapter 2.

fields.name: Alluna and Brie
fields.description: Alluna and Brie is an RPG Social Sim set in Axon City, Australia. Hang out with friends, buy food to boost your stats, and form a team of magical girls to fight off a horde of ravenous monster girls from a parallel dimension. It's just like real life!

fields.name: Groomer
fields.description: Groomer is a relaxing simulation game where take on a role of groomer, a person that takes care of dogs.

fields.name: ШХД: ЗИМА / IT'S WINTER
fields.description: Panel houses, snow, overcast sky, tiny kitchen, shabby staircase… It's Winter is an indie game which genre could be classified as sandbox, post-soviet, sad 3d, russian sadness. Nothing awaits you: there is no chance to get out, no room for adventures and breathtaking plot.

fields.name: The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-earth
fields.description: A companion app for The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-earth board game from Fantasy Flight Games, a fully-cooperative board game for one to five players! This companion app dictates the setup of each encounter, tracks your party’s inventory and skills, and resolves combat while you brave the looming forests, quiet clearings, and...

fields.name: Terrorarium
fields.description: Terrorarium is a game about wanton destruction and adorable gore in player-made murder gardens.

fields.name: Hentai Girl Karen
fields.description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

fields.name: Snake vs Snake
fields.description: Snake vs Snake is a fast paced snake game with an insane battle mode with power-ups and much more. Inspired by old classical Snake but with a much faster arcade pace and local multiplayer support.

fields.name: Hope For Village
fields.description: Hope For Village is an Old-School RPG game. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, enemies of kingdom... Who do you think will win?

fields.name: HYPERFIGHT Max Battle
fields.description: HYPERFIGHT is a fighting game where every hit is lethal, and every win counts. New characters and modes for maximized battle!

fields.name: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich
fields.description: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich is a 2D action platforming game! Become a Cyborg Ninja and destroy the Nazi menace in this throwback to the 16 bit side scrolling glory days!

fields.name: Time Travel VR
fields.description: Our game is powered by UE4 with exquisite scenes! If you have a time machine, what do you want to do most? Now, try it in the game. Step into the world as it was years ago! Time Travel uses its time machine to send you back in time on an adventure of a lifetime.

fields.name: Death Rpg
fields.description: Top Down drag & drop RPG strategy game. Help 3 survivor to kill enemies in different worlds.
fields.developer: Ruskija game experience, Gangsta Studios, Tero Lunkka
fields.publisher: Ruskija game experience, Gangsta Studios, Tero Lunkka

fields.name: BubbleGum-Push
fields.description: Simple, Challenging, Fun, and Free! Fight your way to the top of a cute little gum-ball-machine! A simple and cozy game that will have you hooked in an effort to win prize after prize! Ladies....Gentlemen: BubbleGum-Push!

fields.name: Gladiator: Blades of Fury
fields.description: Gladiator: Blades of Fury is a melee combat action fighting game set during the medieval period. Players can play as a gladiator from four different clans, namely the Barbarians, the Assassins, the Knights, and the Dwarves. All heroes are unique and have their own weapons, skills, and fighting styles.
fields.developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
fields.publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

fields.name: Shards of Infinity
fields.description: Shards of Infinity is the follow-up to the award winning deckbuilding game, Ascension. Build your armies by recruiting allies and champions from four unique factions. Launch surprise attacks on your foes by instantly deploying mercenaries. Unlock limitless power by mastering the Shard of Infinity.

fields.name: Excive A-1000
fields.description: Sometimes the robots set on a riot. Then you start turning them into the ground metal. That is just your job.

fields.name: Photographs
fields.description: Photographs is a Narrative Tragedy Puzzle Game?

fields.name: Keepers Dungeon
fields.description: Keepers Dungeon is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler where you must fight your way through several levels of the dungeon, facing up to 11 unique bosses and various monsters in order to best the dungeon. Spells are your weapons, you can combine different spell-tokens in order to create your own unique spells.

fields.name: Elephants Can't Jump
fields.description: Elephants Can’t Jump is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer with no jump mechanic (did the title give it away?). Join Akkoro, the salty octopus, and the rambunctious elephant Pengin, as they escape abduction on an alien spaceship.

fields.name: Hello, Goodbye
fields.description: "Toubu Kaito" That is the fake name assumed by a young military officer from the United Provinces of Japan. He has been tasked with infiltrating Tenshudo Academy, located in Special District Morino, impersonating a transfer student. He is to cast aside his former identity, and 'become' Toubu Kaito.

fields.name: Little Lost Robots
fields.description: Little Lost Robots is a challenging puzzle game designed for players who want a proper mental workout. Help the robots reach the rescue portal by placing a sequence of commands for them to follow, pressing play, and hoping nothing crashes!

fields.name: Infinite Art Museum
fields.description: The Infinite Art Museum is a free, permanent virtual reality museum and archive of art. Explore a growing collection of over 500 original paintings, illustrations and photographs from artists around the world.

fields.name: Border Control
fields.description: Defend America from murderous zombie hordes, waves of unwashed orcs, and the military stength of enemy nations all bent on the destruction of the homeland.

fields.name: Bleeding Hunt VR Chap.1
fields.description: Experience the movie-like escaping plot with chasing, shooting, and thrilling!The game brings player a short but satisfying VR experience by reproducing the process of a highly-intense chasing plot with the highest quality of game graphic that you’ve ever seen so far in VR!

fields.name: Walden, a game
fields.description: Take on Henry David Thoreau’s classic adventure in living simply in nature as you explore this epic open world game based on the story of Thoreau’s life in the woods alone at Walden Pond.

fields.name: Millionaire Dancer
fields.description: Dance to rhythm & beat and show off your skills."Millionaire Dancer", the title given to the best dancers, is yours.

fields.name: Through Abandoned: The Refuge
fields.description: It’s the new game of Through Abandoned series, classical point and click game. You try to find your twin-brother who disappeared in a huge and mysterious place called Abandoned.

fields.name: Endzeit
fields.description: The world has been taken over by ex military robots idling around and waiting for human targets. Eliminate them on your own in singleplayer mode, together with your friends in coop mode or fight against sleepers and players alike in the online multiplayer mode.

fields.name: Happy Anime Puzzle
fields.description: Happy Anime Puzzle is a great jigsaw puzzle for beautiful girls. Every beautiful girl is a high-quality picture, which absolutely brightens your eyes. Although it's a traditional jigsaw jigsaw puzzle, Happy Anime Puzzle creates a relaxed and pleasant jigsaw atmosphere and guarantees a smooth game experience.

fields.name: RagTag
fields.description: RagTag is a unique blend of action and strategy that puts you in control of a RagTag group of humans, mutants, animals and cyborgs as you fight from extinction across the stars. RagTag has simple mechanics that allow complex manoeuvres and trick shots to dispatch your enemy.

fields.name: FanaticBlader
fields.description: An easy and fast 3D Side-Scroll action game, "Fanatic Blader" Challenge the "Cursed Tower" that any wish will come true!

fields.name: REDVIIL
fields.description: Now it's 2143, my name is Alice, I was born in a small settlement called Gwaine. I dream to continue the work of my great-grandfather: to find a cure for the "Red Death" and release people living in hundreds of bunkers.

fields.name: Frigus İnferos
fields.description: Are you ready for a child's hell? Courage or run away?

fields.name: Pursuer
fields.description: You are a pursuer, and your job is to catch a criminal who has more than 20 victims.

fields.name: Hard Core Puzzle
fields.description: This is a very hard-core puzzle casual game, bring you the purest gaming experience...

fields.name: Leanna's Slice of Life
fields.description: In a world where demons exist, Kain and Leanna live in a relatively peaceful village. The two eventually get married. However, due to the incessant demon attacks, Kain becomes careless and falls into a lot of debt. It'll be up to Leanna to help pay off Kain's debts in this Slice of Life RPG!

fields.name: AntiPodal
fields.description: Trapped in a strange parallel world, face ruthless challenges using wit and skill. Run, jump and swap your way out of tricky situations in this super-tight action puzzle platformer. Will you be able to find and rescue your poor lost chicken?

fields.name: Successor of the Moon
fields.description: A classic 2D side-scrolling action (Metroidvania) game. The young priestess embarks on a journey to solve the monsters' suspicious movements in Parthenope. Seek the help of your peers and elves, Acquire a variety of abilities, and reach the end to discover the truth.

fields.name: Jitsumi's Game Booster
fields.description: Jitsumi Game Booster is a light and fast tool which scans for games that had been launch while providing features such as suspending background processes, cleaning junk files, cleaning errors in drives and system files, overclocking and many more without using much CPU

fields.name: Plaguepunk Justice
fields.description: Become a healer! Cure, don't kill! Turn zombies back to humans! Plaguepunk Justice is a turn-based tactical strategy with alchemy and randomly generated levels.

fields.name: Nin! Nin! Ninja!!!
fields.description: People who like platform games may think this is an easy game, but this is the hardest platforming game EVER! NO ONE CAN COMPLETE THIS GAME.

fields.name: Spacelair
fields.description: Spacelair is a retro sidescroller arcade adventure with various gameplay challenges; health, air, food, work, education, energy, purchase buildings, mini-missions, greenhouses and without violence or shooting. Dive into the parallax future and discover your lair today!!

fields.name: Nothing!
fields.description: What do you play? I play nothing!

fields.name: Ecchi Girls
fields.description: Welcome to the incredible world of Ecchi Girls. Immersed in the game, you can find your new wife and forget about all the external problems.

fields.name: Crash Landed
fields.description: Welcome to Crash Landed! The greatest adventure made by one guy! Your space ship has crashed...Your love is lost...It's time for you to step up! Guide your hero on a dangerous 16-bit style journey on a foreign planet. Travel across 20 heart pounding stages to find your lost love.

fields.name: Warforged
fields.description: A fantasy sandbox RPG heavily inspired by Mount and Blade. Grow your skill with your choice of melee weapon, archery, or magic. Test yourself against powerful creatures. Upgrade your equipment, raise an army, then go to war with other factions and conquer their settlements.

fields.name: Need for Spirit: Off-Road Edition
fields.description: Transporting contraband (the good ol’ booze and cigs) across difficult terrain, has never looked or felt more captivating. Forget about rusty pickup trucks and jeeps. What better way to deter the border patrol than transporting your high-risk wares with a freaking tank?

fields.name: Sephirothic Stories
fields.description: When the world tree begins to wane, what will become of the balance of the world? Discover the truth behind the world tree's waning power in a fantasy RPG! Navigate trap-filled dungeons using only your mind and wit to conquer challenging puzzles!

fields.name: Jungle Z
fields.description: Jungle Z is a doomsday survival game

fields.name: Hentai Shooter 2: World Tour
fields.description: Next chapter in a well-known shooter with hot alien beauties and exotic weapons. Our hero Seranul once again goes on a world tour to free the Earth from the invasion of evil men haters!

fields.name: Holy Road
fields.description: Protect your domain, develop and grow it, all while gaining wealth and power! Economically destroy everyone that stands in your way! Regain what was once yours and get your revenge in Holy Road!

fields.name: Gladiators: Ludus Manager
fields.description: In Ludus Manager you will be managing a Ludus. Believe it or not that's not an easy task, feeding your gladiators and keeping them alive in battle requires effort. In this game you will be playing as Fabius Festus, a Lanista, someone whose job is to manage a Ludus. Buying Slaves, Selling Them, hiring Doctors is all part of the Management.

fields.name: Four-color Fantasy
fields.description: X-rated Tile-matching  game are coming, enjoy it!

fields.name: Drag Star!
fields.description: Get ready, honey! You're a contestant on Drag Star!, the reality TV drag competition. You better throw shade, serve looks, and slay each episode to become the next drag icon!

fields.name: Save Koch
fields.description: You are local mafia kingpin, Jeffrey Koch. Your empire in New Kandinski is in total chaos because an unknown Mastermind has decided to take your place. And they’ve planted a sleeper Mole inside your operation. It’s time to act, but you need to act smart.

fields.name: Deck of Ashes
fields.description: Deck of Ashes is an adventure game with tactical card combat. One character at a time, lead the cast of antiheroes on a quest for redemption. Explore the cursed fantasy world and hunt down powerful cards. Forge a unique Battle Deck, and crush your foes! Can you rid the world of the Ash Curse?

fields.name: Territory Idle
fields.description: Strategic idle game. Develop the kingdom, then abdicate and get gold! For gold, you can buy new tiles and expand the territory.

fields.name: The Explorer of Night
fields.description: The explorer of night is an minimalist platformer, where you need to help the main character to get out of the forest, inhabited by unfriendly enemies and dangerous traps.

fields.name: Robot King Part 2: Boss Battles
fields.description: The second in a 3 part series, Robot King Part 2 continues the journey of a robot on a quest to find his place in a kingdom where everyone seems bent on his destruction. "Robot King 2: Boss Battles" is as the name indicates: a series of boss battles.

fields.name: Hentai Time
fields.description: Hentai time by Fantastic Affected Partial time is a puzzle game, in which you should put blocks in a right place to reproduce the image.

fields.name: Anniversary Collection Arcade Classics
fields.description: 8 KONAMI arcade classics of the 80s, from Nemesis to TwinBee. Including bonus eBook packed with new information never before revealed to the public.

fields.name: uuu so smislom
fields.description: uuu so smislom! is a simple yet challenging and addictive game. It can be played within few seconds anytime to refresh your mind.

fields.name: Drumpfy Walls
fields.description: Jump into an alternate reality where two great countries, Mer'ca and Mer'xico are politically and literally fighting over a border wall. Play as members of two groups, the "Reds" and the "Blues" as they face off each other in a battle over immigration and future votes.

fields.name: Let's Learn Japanese! Katakana
fields.description: Want to read Japanese? Let's learn Katakana! A game teaching the Japanese alphabet through puzzles and arcade-style challenges.

fields.name: Thugs Law
fields.description: Thugs take over the police and now they rule the city. People that not respect their law pay with their lives. Get any weapon that you have and face them. Show no mercy. They will show no mercy on you.

fields.name: Cherry Creek
fields.description: Cherry Creek is a tile-turning puzzle game, the aim is to rotate the river tiles to take water from the fountain to all the cherry trees. The puzzles are set in a picturesque natural environment, and offer something for all abilities.

fields.name: The Abbey - Director's cut
fields.description: The best adventure of Alcachofa Soft.

fields.name: 5.84 Wing
fields.description: 5.84 Wing - Minimalist action-adventure game, with many levels for which you have to overcome a lot of obstacles to collect keys and open doors.

fields.name: BeatShips
fields.description: Flow with the music while defeating enemies. You can use your favourite music to create and share levels with the community and also download new ones to extend your gameplay. Complete levels and unlock new ships and skins to get new game styles and cool looks.

fields.name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Una aventura de cine - Edición especial
fields.description: The return of the adventures "Two sloppy cowboys" and "Terror, horror and fear" in a special edition that is the best and most modern work of the Spanish studio Alcachofa Soft in the franchise.

fields.name: ECCHI NEKO GIRLS PUZZLE
fields.description: This game is an ordinary puzzle game. Here you can find your neko girl.

fields.name: Gensokyo Defenders / 幻想郷ディフェンダーズ / 幻想鄉守護者
fields.description: Use Traps and Spell Cards to fight back the magical masses! Blistering shoot-em-up action meets tactical tower defense as you choose from almost 20 popular characters to stop the fairy onslaught! Take advantage of their unique powers and tricky Traps to freeze, fry, and blow your enemies away!

fields.name: Race for Tuning
fields.description: The city at night, the roar of the engine, nitrous, neon, a tuning... What else do you need for a street race? Burn rubber and become the king of the streets!

fields.name: Dimension Two
fields.description: DimensionTwo, Animate your anime wife! You can interact with all kinds of anime wife on the desktop, and you can make it yourself, so that your wife in your beloved static picture will be alive!

fields.name: Demon Hunter 5: Ascendance
fields.description: You slump into your chair after another day of investigations. Just as you start to lose yourself in the glow of the TV screen, the telephone rings. The museum curator needs your help - a tourist has gone missing. You smirk at his warning of paranormal goings-on; that's what Demon Hunters are for.

fields.name: Audica
fields.description: Audica™ is a VR “rhythm shooter” that combines Harmonix’s award-winning music gameplay with precision shooting mechanics and a killer soundtrack, all set in a mesmerizing cosmic arena.

fields.name: Narco Strike
fields.description: Action game based on real events, in which you take on the role of a drug dealer.

fields.name: Space Pilgrim Academy: Reunion
fields.description: Margaret Dale crosses the galaxy in search of her lost mother, determined to solve once and for all the mysteries surrounding the destruction of Latona station.

fields.name: Owyn's Adventure
fields.description: Call Grandpops and tell him that dinner's ready? What sounds like a straightforward task from Mum becomes an adventure when Owyn leaves the safety of his house and enters a garden world where threats abound, and not even the slowest of creatures can be trusted...

fields.name: Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones
fields.description: Challenging and fun Match 3 Adventure game, where you enter a swashbuckling magic world of legendary pirate. Bobby disappears in Davy Jones’ Locker... Can you save him in time?

fields.name: Brix VR
fields.description: A breakout/arkanoid style game designed for VR.

fields.name: Fold
fields.description: Fold and expand blocks until only one of each color remains in this original puzzler.

fields.name: Game Studio Simulator（我要做游戏）
fields.description: Make a Game Company for your self！Get it work，Run for Rich！

fields.name: Asteroid Hideout
fields.description: Similar to a classic asteroids game you pilot a spaceship through an asteroid belt, but additionally fight waves of enemies. Every hit gives you some score and increases your score multiplier. Go for the highscore! Progress by unlocking more ships and applying upgrades and dive into higher difficulties!

fields.name: Candy Mandy
fields.description: Classic game in the popular "three in a row" genre.

fields.name: VehiCraft
fields.description: This is a vehicle sandbox crafting game that you can build different ground vehicles to fight other vehicles. This game gives the maximum freedom for object placement and customisation for your vehicle.

fields.name: And I Must Scream
fields.description: And I Must Scream is an experience horror game that takes the player through a journey of kid's imagination of how he perceives the world around him. Control Max as he navigates the literal and metaphorical landscapes of trauma on his search for strength and acceptance.

fields.name: CosPuzzle: Giu Hellsing
fields.description: CosPuzzle: Giu Hellsing is a game for cosplay lovers, you can play a nice game and be rewarded with photos of a cosplayer with different clothes.

fields.name: CupGuess
fields.description: This is a casual game of guessing cups, you will play with a beautiful girl. If you guess wrong, she will not develop the following story with you, so in order to enhance the relationship with her, you need to keep your eyes wide open and guess every story correctly.

fields.name: SUBARACITY
fields.description: SubaraCity is a city-making puzzle game, giving a fresh spin on the block-matching genre!

fields.name: Tankorama
fields.description: TANKORAMA is an old school top-down shoot ‘em up game with modern graphics and addictive gameplay. Control HOVERING TANKS, destroy enemies, collect power ups and challenge wicked bosses in single player. Show who is THE BOSS on Earth!

fields.name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation Arctic Hawk
fields.description: Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base. Rescue an as hostage held agent from an unknown arms dealer, adapt to changing weather conditions, and use the the darkness of the night to your favor in this unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

fields.name: Animal Fight Club
fields.description: Invent new creatures by mixing real or legendary animals in thousands of possible combinations, create an army and fight in the singleplayer campaign or in online multiplayer against friends or random challengers!

fields.name: Luminos
fields.description: When the colours of the world are no more… Little Lumi must embark on a journey across a variety of wonderful sceneries to bring them back. Let the adventure begin!

fields.name: Defection
fields.description: Defection is a third-person multiplayer shooter with hand-drawn styling.

fields.name: Cyborg Invasion Shooter 3: Savior Of The World

fields.name: Solitaire Bliss Collection
fields.description: Take a break and enjoy Solitaire Bliss Collection - the ultimate Solitaire collection with over 100 variants in one bundle, including all-time classics like Klondike, Spider Solitaire, Freecell, Tripeaks and Pyramid Solitaire.

fields.name: Matanga
fields.description: Are you not afraid of horror anymore? You are mistaken! The inhabitant of these places - Matanga, is always glad to new guests in his lair and is ready to prove to you that there is always a place for fear! Test your ability to survive in a fight with a local maniac. The game is not for the faint of heart!

fields.name: Rogue Star Rescue
fields.description: Rogue Star Rescue is a fast-paced roguelite bullet hell shooter with tower defense elements. Shoot your way through diverse alien planets while strategically gathering traps and resources for the epic boss fights. Defend your planet and stop the catastrophic Rogue Star from annihilating everything.

fields.name: Nurse Love Syndrome
fields.description: Meet cheerful Kaori Sawai, fresh out of nursing school, as she joins Yurigahama Hospital. Surviving a near death experience as a child left her with a desire to become a nurse and "healing hands" that let her relieve pain in patients just by touching them.

fields.name: The Scuttle
fields.description: Sail the Caribbean laying siege to naval forts in this short pirate adventure! Enhance your galleon, lead your crew into battle, and maybe drink a little rum along the way.

fields.name: Ruination
fields.description: Navigate a hostile alien world full of monstrous creatures! Battle mighty bosses! Wield a vast array of brutal weaponry! Fight your way to the core of the planet and complete your mission... or die.

fields.name: Murder Machine Mini
fields.description: Wake up my little machine and try again. MURDER MACHINE MINI is a tactical FirstPersonShooter unlike any other. No cover, no autoaim, no instanthit, no handholding. A think - move - shoot game.

fields.name: Kare wa Kanojo
fields.description: One boy, three girls, what could possibly happen? Summer of Heisei period 9 (1997), you play as a young boy who just moved to a small village near Osaka. You will meet three girls in this new school. One of them keeps a really deep secret… What secret?

fields.name: Quantum Legend - VR Experience

fields.name: Puzzle 101: Edge of Galaxy 宇宙边际

fields.name: Figure Quest
fields.description: You're a figure. Lots of obstacles stand in your way and you need to escape. Don't get hit and maybe you'll escape.

fields.name: Shadow Corridor
fields.description: Now on Steam, revamped with brand new content! Immerse yourself in the latest chapter of the popular, Japanese indie horror title, Kageroh: Shadow Corridor. Survive against the onslaught of horrors that lie in wait in eerie, traditional Japanese locales that change with every playthrough.

fields.name: Rebirth Fantasy Online
fields.description: Rebirth Fantasy is an open world Free 2D Online RPG, Explore a world of fantasy where slimes, goblins and dragons exist. Play the way you like, create skills, craft items, fight different monsters and explore anywhere without being blocked on a story progression!

fields.name: 1-Bit Revival: The Residuals of Null
fields.description: Four arcade games that pit the player against swarms of enemies inside a deadly matrix system that is programmed to destroy you.

fields.name: Real Al's Humanity Academy
fields.description: Real Al’s Humanity Academy combines wacky minigame action, a bizarre sense of humor, and the world’s most human robot to give you a VR party game unlike any other. There’s never been a better time to learn how to be human. Enroll today!
fields.developer: Brett Moody, Keanan Pucci, Matthew Ricci
fields.publisher: Brett Moody, Keanan Pucci, Matthew Ricci

fields.name: The Woods: VR Escape the Room
fields.description: After a walk in the woods, you find yourself locked in a swaying cage above the forest floor, with no recollection of how you got there. Discover the mysteries this forest has to offer. Solve puzzles, decipher ancient texts, and uncover the mystical secrets hidden within these woods for many years.

fields.name: MONSTERS:SURVIVAL
fields.description: You must survive among different dinosaurs and mutated mutant animals. Explore food, build shelter. Find yourself an animal to tame and go hunting. Be careful not to hunt!

fields.name: 匿名信：失心者 / Strayer
fields.description: A sudden anonymous letter broke everything, full internship police detective followed the letter to the long abandoned thirteen middle school time flies, the eyes of 十三 middle school is not once the ordinary middle school is a trap? Or the truth?

fields.name: Cube Human

fields.name: Magic Heart
fields.description: Eve has a dream to develop magic abilities and return to her homeland, but she suddenly develops close relationships with her two female friends instead.

fields.name: TAMASHII
fields.description: An ancient entity seeking help, a Witch, an unnamed soul and a Twisted Temple. A dark tale about inner discoveries set in a distorted and perverted world.

fields.name: Coloring Game
fields.description: Coloring Game is a fantastic anti-stress game. Animate the pixel picture by coloring it in full!

fields.name: Hei
fields.description: Help Hei to find his path to the sacred tree! A point-and-click adventure game with lots of puzzles and a unique artistic style.

fields.name: Professional Thief
fields.description: Professional Thief - a first person stealth simulator where you play the role of a burglar and are supposed to rob a house.

fields.name: Retro Racing City
fields.description: Retro Racing City is a simulator game of driving in a "retro style" environment, very relaxing and entertaining.

fields.name: Birth of a Hunter
fields.description: Birth of a Hunter is a metroidvania style 2D platformer, with the twist that a huge new map is generated every time you start a new game.

fields.name: Bikini Surfer Girl - Wild Wahine
fields.description: A cool arcade surfing game with lots of options and loads of fun!

fields.name: Shmup Moments
fields.description: Shmup Moments is a shoot-'em-up game that's easy to pick up and play. With arcade-like gameplay, slick controls and sound, hot beats and lighting, and a classic bullet hell ambience, it's the perfect game to chill out with when you need a break from AAA titles, or to meditate with before going to bed.

fields.name: Push Pull

You play as Push and Pull, and must work together through a series of simple looking, yet challenging puzzles in an unknown test facility. Will you persevere and discover what purpose this testing serves? Includes over 40 levels and multiple puzzle mechanics.

fields.name: CPU Architecture Sim

fields.name: Space mining clicker
fields.description: Become the Director, manage your mining facility and try to make profit when surviving to the geopolitical storm opposing the two biggest factions.

fields.name: Antenna Dilemma

fields.name: Gamble Fight Plus

fields.name: Spare Teeth VR

fields.name: Spellcasting Collection

fields.name: Minskies

fields.name: Lofi Ping Pong

The story is about searching a better place to live and of course find your Destiny. You need to pass through cold places and reach into a better place to finish the game.

fields.name: DHARMA: THE SWAN

fields.name: Monster Hunting... For Love!
fields.description: Sit down and have a talk with a variety of monsters that are only looking to have a good time. Play your cards right, and maybe you'll even go home with them. Who knows what will happen after that?

fields.name: Purple Deathmatch

fields.name: Power & Revolution 2019 Edition

In Power & Revolution 2019 Edition, play as the Head of State and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.

fields.name: Ne Touchez Pas 5
fields.description: Navigate 100 levels in this very difficult, fast paced, simple action game.

fields.name: Amber's Airline - 7 Wonders

fields.name: Twinship
fields.description: This little cube is stuck in a parallel world divided between black and white! Help him finish the levels and leave this world!

fields.name: Bud Blitz

fields.name: Real Fishing VR

fields.name: The Horus Heresy: Legions

fields.name: Mango Cart

fields.name: Gekido Kintaro's Revenge

fields.description: You are Wendigo. A hard-hearted contract killer tasked with annihilating a fanatical cult. With your trusted arsenal at the ready, experience what has been called "The most violent game in VR". PLEASE NOTE: This game is very early in development and does not have a large amount of content yet.

fields.name: Balance Roll
fields.description: "Balance Roll" is an exquisite indie game. Although the gameplay is simple, But actually you can't do that easily. Various traps and obstacles, all kinds of sports that ignore the laws of physics, four different theme styles, and even another horrible world...

fields.name: Bears in Tanks

fields.name: Nano Driller

fields.name: GACHIMUCHI The Card Game

fields.name: Its Simple, SHOOT

*** is a small game. It is easy to play,hope you find surprise and happyness in the game. And I will metain and expand this game until I have no better puzzle to put in it.

fields.name: The Far Kingdoms: Awakening Solitaire

It's now clear that this is the work of an evil spell. Find the Elixir of Awakening to save her. The journey will be long and dangerous, but it's your sister's only hope.

fields.name: The far Kingdoms: Winter Solitaire

A powerful earthquake has destroyed the island along with the sacred grove. The Elven Queen seeks your help to restore the island.

fields.name: Luxor Solitaire
fields.description: The Gods have summoned you to the banks of the Nile. Solve Solitaire-Levels and use your skills to build the great city of Luxor.

fields.name: Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning

fields.name: Roach Killer
fields.description: "since I played this game, I won't yell at cockroaches anymore." "play cockroaches every day, fear to quarantined you." Hey! I would like to remind you that you should clean up the house, but it is great feedback. Are you afraid of cockroaches? Aren't you afraid of it? Come together to overcome the cockroach.
