fields.description: Follow along with the adventures of Dulce as she finds new friends, new fun, and maybe even romance in the world of Dragon Connection, a hot new augmented reality mobile game.A, short, sweet free all-ages GxG visual novel featuring cute girls, friendship, and romance!

fields.name: Mad Princess: The Great Gladiators
fields.description: Choose your own path in this gladiator role-playing game. The player starts off as an incarcerated criminal, forced to fight for their life. After they leave the prison, they will embark on a journey to sharpen their skills.

fields.name: Zombies In The Forest
fields.description: In 2022, humanity was faced with an outbreak of an unknown virus that quickly killed 99% of people. After the death of his group, the main character will have to do the job or die.

fields.name: A Game For You, Josh
fields.description: this game is for josh

fields.name: Furry Chronicles
fields.description: Furry Chronicles is a classic sidescrolling platformer game with challenging levels and puzzles.

fields.name: Stoppa!
fields.description: Stop time and manipulate objects around you to reach the goal line!

fields.name: Outbreak: Lost Hope
fields.description: A mother desperately struggles against the undead and searches for her lost daughter in this hardcore survival horror nightmare.

fields.name: xMoon
fields.description: xMoon is a puzzle game set on The Moon. It's about using mirrors to reflect laser beams into crystals.

fields.name: EURGAVA™ - Tomb of Senza
fields.description: Your days are numbered! End your sickness before you run out of time in this sidescroller beat-em-up RPG! Fight your way until you reach your goal in EURGAVA™ - Tomb of Senza!

fields.name: Hentai Mosaique Vip Room
fields.description: Beautiful anime girls + scrambled mosaiques. Who knew both of those things come together so...

fields.name: I Support Breast Cancer Research
fields.description: The Breast Cancer Research Foundation is an independent, not-for-profit organization which supports clinical and transnational research on breast cancer.

fields.name: Reflections ~Dreams and Reality~
fields.description: A visual novel about a girl who wishes to escape her fate and those who follow closely behind her. Features both GxB and GxG routes.

fields.name: Mistress of Maids: First Castle
fields.description: You wanted to congratulate the king on his birthday and presented him a fabulous pudding. You have never seen such a happy king, his happiness knew no bounds. Everyone had fun! But at the most solemn moment, the pudding gave an angry cry: "AAAAA".

fields.name: Super Space Jump Man
fields.description: Super Space Jump Man is a fun and challenging gravity based runner. Traverse from planet to planet while dodging spikes, lasers and collecting oxygen.

fields.name: vApe Escape
fields.description: vApe Escape is a point-and-click adventure in a science fiction comedy setting. The player takes control of an innocent ape who must escape the sad destiny of becoming a vape dispenser machine for the wealthy hipsters of the universe.

fields.name: Prison Escape
fields.description: It has been far too long since the last time the inmate has been outside of the prison walls. Now that he has a chance to escape and live a free life... What will happen when he gets to return home.

fields.name: Chocolate makes you happy: Lunar New Year
fields.description: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, fires, paper lanterns, dragons and explosions.

fields.name: Nyasha
fields.description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

fields.name: The Ploshers
fields.description: Frantic action and lots of fun. 1 or 2 players. Keyboard and Xbox controller or compatible. Casual look, hardcore gameplay. Demo available.

fields.name: EscapeRoute
fields.description: The robots are in control , things are so tight you think you can’t even breath without letting them know. You decide to not be part of this and then it happens …..

fields.name: Song Animals
fields.description: A surreal journey of strange animals through hand-painted watercolour worlds set to a relaxing soundtrack

fields.name: Bug Aviators in Theme Park
fields.description: This is the game to attempt to recreate the realities having been in dreams of the creator. You can venture in the dreamy world of the handcrafted figures.

fields.name: Mage VR: The Lost Memories
fields.description: Maybe you don't remember, but some of us do remember that we are Mages. Try a gesture, see if it starts fire in your hands, maybe you are one of us. Use this power and please save the world from this new malediction.
fields.developer: Baptiste Degryse, Colombe Sechehaye, Brayan Delmée
fields.publisher: Baptiste Degryse, Colombe Sechehaye, Brayan Delmée

fields.name: Command: Desert Storm
fields.description: Command - Desert Storm is a new DLC release for Command: Modern Air/Naval Operations. Fourteen historical & hypothetical campaign scenarios plus a bonus contemporary standalone scenario cover the major actions that marked the conflict, allowing you to explore the events that happened - and the ones that could easily have.

fields.name: Space Smash
fields.description: Inspired by classic Arcade games, Space Smash is a fast, addictive and retro shoot 'em up!

fields.name: A way up!
fields.description: A way up! is a simple platformer about throwing a rock. WARNING - you may find it really hard.

fields.name: National Park Girls
fields.description: All Eve ever wanted was to protect and preserve the land, but after five years of being a ranger in Yosemite National Park, she’s just about ready to throw in the towel. However, things start to change when she meets three spritely girls who claim to represent the National Parks.

fields.name: Junglex
fields.description: Rex got lost in this hostile jungle! Help him finish the levels and leave this place!

fields.name: MiniGolf Maker
fields.description: Build the miniature golf course of your dreams in MiniGolf Maker. Play locally or online with up to 8 players, and Share your course with the world on the Steam Workshop.

fields.name: Pokris
fields.description: A combination of poker and a certain falling blocks game. Match cards into pairs, straights, flushes, and more as they drop from the top. Beat your high score before the board fills up!

fields.name: Marvin The Hatter
fields.description: Marvin The Hatter - this is the story of a boy caught in his nightmares, who is trying to get out of them and understand who dragged him into them.

fields.name: Cat Defense
fields.description: An army of the undead attacked the defenseless village of cute kittens

fields.name: Auf Abwegen
fields.description: Explore the beauty and dangers of nature in this narrative mini-puzzle-platformer - a one-man project from Kindman. Slip into the role of a red fox in its natural habitat - feed your family and survive the threats of the forest - and humans too!

fields.name: Night Catcher
fields.description: You are the cop who fell asleep in his office. Waking up, you learn of some psychopath who craves for your death and informs of this through notes. Try to get out of the police station avoiding meeting the robot guard.

fields.name: Seven Bullets Zombie Apocalypse
fields.description: Oldschool infinite runner. Try to survive with your trusty rifle and remaining 7 bullets in a clip, in a world after the zombie apocalypse.

fields.name: €100
fields.description: The Magic Wallet once again take his quest in search for untold wealth, to fulfill the long-held dream of its owner. Go to parallel worlds to collect hundreds of euros, and make the old lady happy!

fields.name: DooM in the Dark
fields.description: The space station has undergone an unknown contamination from space, the previously unknown X virus mutates, almost the entire station crew is infected, you need to stop the army of mutants before they break through to Earth and doomsday began!

fields.name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations
fields.description: If you like to make puzzles, Super Jigsaw Puzzle is your game. Enjoy its comfortable and intuitive interface and its relaxing music that will allow you to concentrate on the difficult task of solving these beautiful photos that pose a real challenge for lovers of puzzles.

fields.name: Mysteries of the Undead
fields.description: Demystify the zombie island and break the ancient curse!

fields.name: Royal Gems
fields.description: Countless king's bounties will be yours! User your wit, and the prize will be yours in no time!

fields.name: You Died but a Necromancer revived you
fields.description: You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! Reaching the top is no easy feat: The pathways are narrow, full of traps and on top of that, the floor will start exploding behind you if you take too long!

fields.name: GoK
fields.description: Game of kingdoms [/ b] [/ i] - welcome to new world Game of Kingdoms! Plunge into exciting adventures in action genre with the wide function of RPG and open world. Become support for your people and learn the secrets of this world!

fields.name: Mow Problem
fields.description: Use a familiar block programming interface to efficiently guide your lawn mower across all the lawns, throughout the seasons. Mow Problem is a casual puzzle game featuring relaxing music designed to improve your logic and thought skills.

fields.name: Zakk Hazard The Deadly Spawn
fields.description: zakk is trapped on mars to fend off mutants in this run & gun platforming adventure.

fields.name: Shipped
fields.description: Challenge your friends in a naval battle of steering, pushing and shooting. Keep your ship on-screen and avoid crashing with land to survive.

fields.name: Senpai Teaches Me Japanese: Part 1
fields.description: Have you ever wanted to learn Japanese ? This visual novel boasts quick and easy learning in a fun environment, making this is a great place to start !

fields.name: Back to 1998
fields.description: Do you love point & click adventures from the 90s? You're in right place! Become a hero, who is solving puzzles in different locations doing his best to get back to his home and family. Lot's of gadgets from those times, good sense of humor and unforgettable dialogs, which will entertain you.

fields.name: Hell Hole
fields.description: Hell Hole is a challenging 2D fast action casual game with the aim to make it to the bottom of various holes while avoiding the creatures that lurk there. As the player, you are simply falling down the hole continuously trying to survive to get to the bottom.

fields.name: Classic Racers
fields.description: Taste the feelings of vintage driving in this game with its wondeful graphics and its realistic physics engine. Cross the finish line at the top off the hill as fast as possible ! Make the best time to be the best ranked at the world leaderboards.

fields.name: Brave knight runner
fields.description: Brave knight goes on the hunt! You are completely alone among the hordes of enemies. Run through dangerous levels, throw axes at enemies and leave obstacles behind you. You have only one life - do not blunder! Use your skills and reactions to keep your enemies off guard.

fields.name: Fat Prisoner Simulator
fields.description: Fat Prisoner Simulator - a soccer simulator where you play the role of a prisoner. The jail managers have noticed that some prisoners, who really like to eat a lot, can hardly go through the doors, including those of their cells.

fields.name: Running Ninja
fields.description: Run! Jump! Dodge! In this platformer you will need your reaction speed and clarity of mind. Сhallenge the deadly tower and prove that you are worthy of the title of ninja.

fields.name: Pirate Cannons AHOY!
fields.description: Ahoy mateys! Take charge of your fort defenses as hostile pirates invade to steal your treasure! Defend your treasure chests in this classic cannon-shooting take in this casual tower-defense game.

fields.name: Infinitely up
fields.description: Infinitely up - this is an physical interesting puzzle in which you need to build a tower as high as possible. The difficulty lies in the fact that if at least one piece falls, you lose. Can you build the largest tower?

fields.name: 迷宫战争(Maze Wars)
fields.description: Maze Wars is a rougelike-like real-time battle game for maze dungeons. Players play programmers who are sent to the game world by their bosses for testing. They are constantly clearing customs to overcome the monsters designed by programmers themselves.

fields.name: Trap for Winners
fields.description: A gripping sci-fi interactive thriller that lets you shape your own character and his morality. YOU make the choices – and suffer the consequences!

fields.name: RainDesktop
fields.description: RainDesktop allows you to create and display customizable live themes on your desktop with build-in WYSIWYG visual designer, from system and weather information to audio visualizers. You are only limited by your imagination and creativity.

fields.name: House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside
fields.description: Use the power of light to defeat a devastating darkness before it destroys mankind!

fields.name: Eternal Journey: New Atlantis
fields.description: Solve the greatest archeological puzzle known to man: the origin of Atlantis!

fields.name: Mind's Eye: Secrets of the Forgotten
fields.description: Follow an enterprising journalist who smells murderous intent behind what everyone assumes was a suicide.

fields.name: Author Clicker
fields.description: Select images and text from randomly provided content to create your own story or visual novel! No typing!

fields.name: pepeizq's Cities
fields.description: Build a city as you want and be able to make it grow earning money creating employment while you are able to have enough population and food.

fields.name: Brood
fields.description: Immerse into a mythical meadow full of unrevealed secrets as you play as a fox attempting to find something dear to him.

fields.name: Poggers
fields.description: Take control of Bun-Bun Poggers the adorable bunny rabbit in this classic retro arcade game where the goal is to cross a dangerous field of cobras and a then cross a wide river by jumping on floating logs to get him home!

fields.name: NOTE : a Composer and a Note
fields.description: "I'VE DONE SOMETHING WONDERFUL" _ PLAY Mephistowaltz NOTE : a composer and a note is an indie minimalist 2d platformer for every artist in the world. Player is both a composer and a note. This is the journey for composition with a unique mechanic. Player plays like playing the piano. It offers a thrill, fresh and meaning.

fields.name: StoneTide: Age of Pirates
fields.description: Embark on your most immersive, open world, pirate action experience ever! Will you survive the World of StoneTide?

fields.name: Draw With Unknown
fields.description: Take your brush and create your best work! Draw with friends or strangers!

fields.name: Bunny Parking
fields.description: Unsual 3d parking puzzle with kicking mechanics. Kicking is fun! Kick a car from the parking lot alone or with friends. And don't think that it will be easy.

fields.name: Over My Dead Pixel
fields.description: Over My Dead Pixel is a top down shooter where you command antivirus software to defend your computer from malware. Beware, firing your weapons will shrink your playspace. Maneuver deftly to avoid the enemies and the walls, as one single hit means restarting.

fields.name: Amanda's Sticker Book 2 - Amazing Wildlife
fields.description: After winning her first sticker book competition, Amanda has her eyes set on even greater heights. Help Amanda create award-winning sticker books. Swap stickers, earn power-ups and clear each puzzle to make Amanda's new dream come true.

fields.name: Find the Oil Racing Edition
fields.description: Find the Oil Racing Edition is a racing game where you must to find the stolen oil with the help of different vehicles like super car, a 4x4 monster and a simple sedan. If you thought this mission will be easy, think again!

fields.name: BlueGlow
fields.description: BlueGlow is an arcade like top down shooter. You play as the blues on a mission to destroy the reds as you go through several maps and gamemodes. Utilize 7 guns from your arsenal, all with different traits, to blow through the enemy.

fields.name: Lifeless Vanguard
fields.description: Lifeless Vanguard is about shooting spaceships to make them go BOOM ... without going BOOM yourself! The goal is simple: fight your way through a massive fleet of hostile forces and take down their mothership. Prove you're the best, get your name to the top of the leaderboard!

fields.name: Survival Frenzy
fields.description: You are no hero in this game.  You are just an average Joe.  Looking for teamwork? Heroic feat? Not here!  Be mean. Be dirty. Do what you got to do to survive.  Struggle to live.  Get the key. Get the gun.  Stay alive and escape.

fields.name: BUCKLER 2
fields.description: BUCKLER 2 is a retro-styled roguelite platformer that tells a story about love, hate, and everything in between. Join Venice and his friends as they embark on an epic adventure across Sector Omega, an unfamiliar world filled with enemies, allies, hazards, and more!

fields.name: SpaceBullet
fields.description: In this game , you need to control a spaceship to defeat your enemy and get your best points .There are also kinds of bullets appear in your game , if you get a tool,you can change your bullet.Just like the way to change bullets, you need to get a card tool so as to control cards to choose the fate of your spaceship.

fields.name: Adventure Climb VR
fields.description: Adventure Climb VR is a FREE room-scale climbing experience consisting of a short one level adventure through the Canyon. Achieve triumph through a rock climbing challenge designed by actual rock climbers. Race to the top, or explore the various Easter Eggs and SECRET Locations.

fields.name: Prologue for a Vacant Kingdom
fields.description: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and uncover the mystery of why everyone disappeared.

fields.name: Killer Chambers
fields.description: Help Brave Lord survive the Killer Chambers and defeat the bosses summoned by Lord Grave! Quick reflexes and good memory are the keys to success in this unforgiving action-platformer. Can you clear all 5 floors and get the King's Crown?

fields.name: The Color of the Roses
fields.description: Dmitriy – successive and ambitious young man who works as a real estate agent. His seemingly quiet and regular life is dramatically changing after one unfortunate nightcall.

fields.name: Attack Noids
fields.description: A review of the classic arcade. Break bricks with retro style!

fields.name: Slime Simulator Games
fields.description: Slime Simulator Games & Putty Simulator - Super Calming Recipes for Slime Games, So Fun!

fields.name: Protocol VR
fields.description: By signing below, you agree to follow the Protocol. Protocol is a program of strict rules created to make first contact with an alien life form that got shot down in the Arctic Circle.

fields.name: Future Futures - Command Z
fields.description: Command Z is a virtual reality gallery poised as a space for collaboration founded to engage the exponential digitization of art and its presentation. Future Futures was developed during the Jump Into The Light artist residency in the Lower East Side of New York City.

fields.name: Darkest Depths
fields.description: Darkest Depths is a fast-paced, first-person shooter that features RPG elements and mind-blowing movement within a dungeon that becomes more and more dangerous as you traverse deeper. Randomized guns, upgrades, and levels make each play-through fresh and innovative.

fields.name: Chill II
fields.description: Chill is a puzzle game with relaxing music. Find a way out of a Maze with 5 levels of difficulty. Enjoy minimalist puzzle game while listening to calm music.

fields.name: Observers
fields.description: Work alongside your friends to collect all the cosmic diamonds in a co-operative chaotic party platforming performance. Play as one of four aliens, each with their own unique ability.

fields.name: Exogenesis ~Perils of Rebirth~
fields.description: Exogenesis ~Perils of Rebirth~ is an epic ADVENTURE GAME/VISUAL NOVEL HYBRID which combines the point-and-click gameplay of adventure games with the heavy focus on storytelling found in visual novels.

fields.name: Human Sacrifice
fields.description: When I woke up I was at a ceremonial place. Several deaths await you ahead of your choice to survive. Can you unravel this ceremony's mystery and survive?

fields.name: Legend of Cina
fields.description: A SRPG game made from SRPG Studio.

fields.name: Fight Angel/格斗天使
fields.description: An all-female character fighting game with customizable characters, realistic chest swaying physical effect and a clothes breaking system.

fields.name: RRRR2
fields.description: RRRR2 continuation of the game RRRR, the Reindeer is added to the team.

fields.name: Dead Quest
fields.description: You are on a mission to find hidden keys and map pieces scattered throughout various levels and areas. Each piece brings you closer to the next, and every key unlocks more of your base. Leading to the end game.

fields.name: Money Bath VR / 札束風呂VR
fields.description: A dream app that allows you to experience a money bath with VR! In addition, the life of the millionaire is fully reproduced! More fun girls will entertain you (rich man)! !

fields.name: iMemory
fields.description: iMemory - This is a logical game designed to train the memory and attention of the player.

fields.name: Nyasha Winter
fields.description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

fields.name: Infinitely up 2
fields.description: Infinitely up 2 - this is the second part of the physical puzzle, where you need to build a tower of randomly drawn shapes. The higher your tower the more points you get. Can you build the highest tower?

fields.name: Melting pot.
fields.description: The hero advances the story of love by selecting one from among three men (prince, singer, devil). Fate will change greatly depending on your choice.

fields.name: BreakFest
fields.description: Play as Waltynn, a waffle from the planet Hekta who lost control of his spaceship and crashed on the planet Lylo. Help him survive and escape the planet. As you explore the planet, you realize that you've landed right in the middle of a Apocalypse.

fields.name: Data mining 7
fields.description: Data mining 7 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

fields.name: Zeta Complex
fields.description: Hardcore tactical action-platformer with rogulike elements

fields.name: Duckumentary
fields.description: Gather all the types of birds, and get out of here before you become fried chicken!

fields.name: Glacial
fields.description: 1988, a chill is in the air, and fear hides in the dark. Glacial is an immersive first person horror where you will be on a venture to discover the truth behind your haunting findings.

fields.name: Tricky Cat
fields.description: Help this cute cat jumping on tiles but don’t fall down!

fields.name: Newt's Voyage
fields.description: Join Newt Isaacson, explorer extraordinaire, as he travels from moon to moon in the solar system collecting samples of each one's surface.

fields.name: It's Too Rainy Day
fields.description: This game is about how in good weather you can please under the torrential rain...

fields.name: Human Rights
fields.description: Human Rights is an interactive lyric video / toy, developed as a companion piece to the song 'Human Rights' by Monster Mansion. Players explore a set of scenes and objects that relate to self expression, while listening to the song, which was inspired by the 2017 Australian same-sex marriage vote.

fields.name: Night shot
fields.description: This is a very fun, fast and simple game, both adults and children can play it. Each of the players has his own cowboy for whom you need to collect ammunition in order for him to shoot at your opponent.

fields.name: Borderlight
fields.description: Borderlight is a 2D colonist simulator with an emphasis on resources. Gather, import, and sell various resources or use them to construct buildings. Acquire settlers and assign them jobs. Level up and assign points to further increase resource incomes. Defend against zombies or lose resources trying.

fields.name: Dust On Wheels
fields.description: Who comes first to the finish in this long grueling dusty race depends on you.

fields.name: 长天 Long Sky
fields.description: "Long Sky" is a small arcade flight avoidance game that can switch the first person perspective. It's fast, easy, tight, and repeatable, with elements of collection and challenges.

fields.name: Picross Floof
fields.description: Relaxing picross puzzle game for when wanting to rest and still challenge the brain. Contains 500 levels from 5x5 to 20x20 with singular and composite levels.

fields.name: Bowling Over It
fields.description: Bowling to the top, never stop.

fields.name: You Versus 27 Elves
fields.description: Fight your way through 27 unique elves in a journey that will bring you happiness, to your wits' end, and maybe even to tears. As you learn more about these thankless slaves who now wish to conquer the Earth, there's only one question you need to ask yourself: Will you be the hero the world needs?

fields.name: Lovers of Aether
fields.description: Are you tired of fighting? Lovers of Aether is the game for you! This is a wholesome animal dating simulator set in the world of Rivals of Aether.

fields.name: International Affairs
fields.description: 2019's most controversial and exciting release, International Affairs asks: "Do YOU have what it takes to seduce a world leader?!" With shocking plot twists, jaw-dropping dialogue, and five globetrotting hunks to choose from, the prospect of achieving world peace has never been so sensual.

fields.name: No Time
fields.description: After you escaped with a time machine from a secret facility you go on a trip through time. Visit all possible time periods with specific jobs and quests for each of them. But watch out for the Time Agents. And avoid yourself!
The story of the writer Mike Williams, a specialist in paranormal phenomena, he is sent to the dead city of Centralia to search for inspiration, to finish writing your book on the paranormal.

fields.name: Massive Effect
fields.description: Space shooter with multiple game modes. Destroy enemies, get experience and increase your level.

fields.name: The Trials of Olympus III: King of the World
fields.description: Angelo’s thrilling story comes to an end in this epic conclusion to the "Trials of Olympus" match3 trilogy… Play 100 challenging match-3 levels, use 32 upgrades to help you beat the designing Xerxes and save Greece!

fields.name: Destruction
fields.description: Destruction is a game that destroys enemies up to 25 stages. A variety of powerful enemies will attack you. Don't let your guard down and use three modes and a variety of skills to destroy your enemies.

fields.name: Tree Simulator 2020
fields.description: It's exactly what it sounds like. You are the tree! You are equaled by no other. Relax and be the best tree you can be.

fields.name: Hotdog Man
fields.description: This is a recreational puzzle game.

fields.name: Static
fields.description: A futuristic psychological thriller escape room adventure taking you through the once full apartment that you are responsible for.

fields.name: PipeWorks
fields.description: A short and semi-sweet 2D platformer to recover precious coffee and fix the leaks in Coffee Co factory! Endure the crazed coffee-highs of the critters infesting throughout and the nagging feeling that all of your work is disregarded by your corporate overlords!

fields.name: Cold Cable: Lifeshift
fields.description: Take role as a survivor in COLD CABLE: LIFESHIFT, a 3D First Person action-puzzle game, with survival elements, where you have to gather supplies, control radiation level and shoot monsters on your way to reach the next level. If you want to play this game, get ready for the chaos.

fields.name: 丛林掠夺/Woods Looting
fields.description: An UNPRECEDENTED semi-turn-based roguelike game with brand new concept. Charge speed bar to full for attack, or not necessarily full if using "Unrestricted Skill". Most enemies won't stop even your speed bar is full! Unexpectedly more exciting, just upgrade Equipment, Artifact, etc. to fight NOW!

fields.name: Pixvault
fields.description: From generation to generation, after the death of the keeper, a new keeper was born on earth.

fields.name: Magnetized knight
fields.description: The knight is sent to a dangerous task in which he must complete all the riddles of an abandoned castle - using gravity for this.

fields.name: Tipping Point
fields.description: Tipping Point is an immersive, photorealistic adventure game with challenging puzzles and a satisfying story filled with drama, humor and unexpected plot twists. Original music, lifelike characters, animals and scenery all come together to create a cinematic experience.

fields.name: Lord of the click
fields.description: Military valor, courage and honor – if these words mean something to you, then you are a direct road to the game Lord of the Click.

fields.name: Wasteland Survival
fields.description: Survive the post apocalypse in Wasteland Survival - the last shelter for survivors on earth! The first thing you need learn is survival. Build home. Craft & Upgrade weapons to kill hordes of zombies, Hunt & Explore with your dog. Gather resources and PVP Plunder... Can you stop the zombie apocalypse?

fields.name: VR health care (shoulder joint exercise): Apple Grove Picking Games
fields.description: VR health care (shoulder joint exercise): Use the exercise method combined with the apple picking action，Unlock cool effects、Experience the flames of wings、Get gorgeous aura and full screen effects，Exercise shoulder joints in VR entertainment

fields.name: The 7th Guest: 25th Anniversary Edition
fields.description: The famous game remastered in a new 25th Anniversary Edition! The father and mother of all 'Haunted Mansion' games. Winner of multiple gaming awards and “No. 1 Rated Game of 1994”.

fields.name: The Crater
fields.description: A thrilling murder mystery in space. Someone is out to kill you. Is it your friend and colleague or is there someone else hiding on the moonbase?

fields.name: Hentai Waifu
fields.description: Hentai Waifu is a casual puzzle game, where you reveal gorgeous girls pictures while you relax in a 3 difficulties puzzle.

fields.name: Enter Synapse
fields.description: Enter Synapse - pixel puzzle that can kill a lot of time.

fields.name: Choice of the Dragon
fields.description: Battle heroes, wizards, and rival dragons in your insatiable thirst for gold and infamy. Start by dominating a local tribe of goblins, then usurp the kingdom, defending and expanding your despotic regime to annex neighboring kingdoms, incinerating the peasants in their thatched-roof cottages.

fields.name: Mundus - Impossible Universe
fields.description: We invite you to join the great shaman in a quest to explore the impossible universe in this fantastic match-3 game. You will find dozens of unique worlds with their own rewards… and dangers. Face challenging match-3 puzzles and meet strange denizens of fantastic planets.

fields.name: Goddess of Math 数学女神
fields.description: This is an action-puzzle game. Find your way to pass the levels. A lot of mathematical elements are integrated in the puzzles.

fields.name: AoT: Attack on Titanous The Game
fields.description: The Walls have kept us safe... until now!

fields.name: Moonstone Crossroads
fields.description: Moonstone Crossroads is an open world VR game filled with various activities such as farming, hunting, mini-games, climbing, and more! It is a new in-depth VR world experience!

fields.name: Grand Battle
fields.description: In this intense fully featured Action RPG, players fight with multiple heroes to save the world. And sometimes they chill and do some crafting!

fields.name: Picross Hansel and Gretel - Nonograms
fields.description: 200 Japanese crosswords that you just can't put down!

fields.name: Blanket Heavy With Nightmares
fields.description: Blanket Heavy With Nightmares is an art installation created By Finnish artist Suvi Solkio in cooperation with Kajaani Art Museum and Kajaani University of Applied Sciences.
fields.developer: Clever Simulation Entertainment, Kajaani University Of Applied Sciences, Finnish Museum Association, Kajaani Art Museum, Artist Suvi Solkio
fields.publisher: Clever Simulation Entertainment, Kajaani University Of Applied Sciences, Finnish Museum Association, Kajaani Art Museum, Artist Suvi Solkio

fields.name: Curious Cases
fields.description: For Desktop or VR! In this 3 chapter story, you play as a modern day legend, Detective Thomas Moore. He has solved more cases than one can count, where others hit dead-ends, he gets to work.

fields.name: Cyber Rage Retribution
fields.description: Cyber Rage: Retribution - computer Action game in the genre of cyberpunk for one and two players. In the future, mankind has faced the threat, an evil genius seeks to enslave the population of the planet with the help of chips, under the influence of which people fall into a rage.

fields.name: Prismatic Maze
fields.description: Prismatic Maze is an experimental maze game where maps maps are grown organically, naturally arranging themselves into a lock-and-key pattern. Hidden in each maze are tools, treasure and ingredients to make more complex mazes.

fields.name: Stupid Quest - Medieval Adventures
fields.description: Come to live the stupidest story you have ever experienced.

fields.name: Hit&Run VR baseball
fields.description: Now, You can experience real-like baseball stadium fields atmosphere. Hit & Run VR is a indoor virtual sports game which you can play like a real baseball player. Just push the trigger button and hit the ball! Make your highest score! Having Fun !

fields.name: The Walsingham Files - Chapter 1
fields.description: From the makers of the “Silver Creek Falls” trilogy comes a new episodic mystery-adventure game series known as “The Walsingham Files”. Follow in the steps of the stalwart Detective Sara Fitzgerald as she tackles a new mind-boggling mystery that will keep you at the edge of your seat at all times.

fields.name: 1vs1: Battle Royale for the throne
fields.description: Enjoy the exciting story of the confrontation of the crown princes in they battle for the throne. Complete the test in the ancient temple caves to prove your right to the royal throne!

fields.name: ISLANDERS
fields.description: ISLANDERS is a minimalist strategy game about building cities on colorful islands.

fields.name: Helltower
fields.description: Helltower is a challenging retro style action platformer. Ascend the tower to discover the fiendish traps and gruesome creatures lurking above. Can you get to the top?

fields.name: Shadow Runner
fields.description: Shadow Runner is a speedrun-oriented platformer, where you can use classical gameplay mechanics like dashing or double jumping, as well as more complex ones like the ability to switch between light and shadows as your character cannot stay in both.

fields.name: Soccer Player Simulator
fields.description: Soccer Player Simulator – a physics-based soccer simulator. The main feature of the game is the unpredictable behavior of the players on the pitch.

fields.name: Creature Hunt
fields.description: Creature Hunt is a combination of a survival horror and a hunting simulator. According to some articles in the local press, a few days ago several bodies of dead tourists were found in the woods of North Carolina.

fields.name: BUTCHERBOX
fields.description: How long can you last in a box flooding with vicious monsters? Pretty weapons might distract you, but not them. You're gonna have to prove your metal. Challenge your friends, challenge the world. Fight for rank! Did I mention the lead is unlimited?

fields.name: Meaty McSkinBones
fields.description: Meaty McSkinBones is a single-player puzzle/platformer where the character is split into three separate bodies. They each have unique abilities or can work together to solve puzzles and traverse the environment. It's quirky, hilarious, and a ton of fun!

fields.name: Unreal Maze Survival
fields.description: Survive for a given time in 10 different pre built mazes each with its own unique theme, size, and difficulty.

fields.name: Easy Shooter
fields.description: 1st person shooter. There are 2 game modes, 2 locations, 3 characters and 6 weapons.

fields.name: Universe 24
fields.description: Universe 24 is a local highscore style, madness action based, 3d platform game. On the planet Esaga conflict has erupted after a enormous flying machine "Gimmle" has fallen from the heavens.

fields.name: Sounds of Talent: Kpop Adventure
fields.description: Become a Kpop superstar in this exciting video game adventure

fields.name: Delirium VR
fields.description: A VR exclusive horror game where you wake up in an eerie abandoned home and discover what insanity prevailed over its history, as you uncover the remnants of its past inhabitants; Jon and Anna.

fields.name: Extinction: Alien Invasion
fields.description: Annihilate waves of aliens, build your base, improve your mercenary, do it all with a sound track bathed in rock. Extinction Alien Invasion is an arcade shooter with elements of RPG, inspired by games like: Dead nation, Shadowgrounds, Alien Breed and Alien Swarm.

fields.name: I'm on Observation Duty
fields.description: Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. When you spot an anomaly you have to file a report to fix it. You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night.

fields.name: Gorilla Unko
fields.description: A game, keep avoiding the gorilla's UNKO. Avoid as much UNKO as you can. Compete your high score in online rankings.

fields.name: THE SOUL HUNTER
fields.description: I'm a hunter, a soul hunter. It sounds a little weird. There aren't many people like us. Nobody knows we exist, but we do.

fields.name: ItazuraVR Safe for Work
fields.description: Communication game watching women's livesThe cousin you used to play together suddenly came back and started to live next door. She has grown into a fine, young woman.

fields.name: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla
fields.description: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla is a short adventure in which you play as Layla, a former, high-ranking member of a secret order of assassins.

fields.name: Game club "Waka-Waka"
fields.description: Game Club "Waka Waka" [/ b] - computer club simulator!

fields.name: Real Life Battle Royal: It's gonna be an... EPIC game
fields.description: Battle Royale games are the new trend, everyone is making one.. but this is the LAST one you will ever need in your life!

fields.name: Dolphin Swim
fields.description: Dolphin Swim. A simple experience in seeing how long you can last navigating a zig zag path.

fields.name: Die Already
fields.description: Already at the first stages of war, the mankind sustains huge losses, thousands of people are taken prisoner where chipization are exposed. After long war the mankind after all manages to beat off the attack of aliens.

fields.name: Slow.Bullet VR
fields.description: Survive, Shoot, and Win! A co-op multiplayer zombie Survival Game, now in VR!

fields.name: TOK 2
fields.description: Tok is a game where you will have to solve a puzzle by connecting all dots with lines. Note: the number of turns is limited!

fields.name: Monster Girl Fantasy
fields.description: Monster Girl Fantasy is an RPG that thrusts you deep into a fantasy world filled with exotic creatures and seductive monster girls. Are you able to gain the trust of monster girls and stop demons from taking them as slaves?

fields.name: Exosphere
fields.description: Shoot, jump & bounce your way into the outer layer of the atmosphere!

fields.name: aMAZE Easter
fields.description: aMAZE Easter is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with Easter art and calm soundtrack.

fields.name: Peekaboo
fields.description: Peekaboo — hide & seek on the network. Players are divided into two teams: props and hunters. Props take the form of objects and adopt their physical properties, and hunters are trying with all their might to find them.

fields.name: Latangerine Last Journey
fields.description: A short and linear story. Also a spin-off of "Les 4 Alice : Lorange Journey". Alyce Latangerine is trapped in a strange house.

fields.name: Super Catscape
fields.description: Super Catscape is a 2D sidescroller retro platformer about Kim, a brave kitten who is abducted by strange alien creatures. Kim has to find a way to escape from the strange alien planet, saving all captive pets in his way back to Earth.

fields.name: Becoming a Dandelion Spore
fields.description: - Drag your mouse in the direction of the wind - The flower will fly in the drag direction. - Please go to the end. - If a conflict occurs, start over.

fields.name: 迷雾 The Mist
fields.description: "The Mist" is a text association decryption game. There are 40+ super hard puzzles. Do you want to know how smart you are? There are statistics for each level. Come to challenge yourself!

fields.name: In the Pause Between the Ringing
fields.description: In the Pause between the Ringing is a rumination about completion, about territorial margins and about the haunting of bodies and memories that are translated across borders. It is an adaption of an unpublished story written by Mir Umar Hassan for the editor of the Malwa Chronicle in the July of 1958.

fields.name: At Home
fields.description: At Home is an indie horror where strangers come to your house and kidnap you and then you find yourself in a forest in a locked hut. Your task now is to escape.

fields.name: Horse Riding Tales
fields.description: The horse riding game of your dreams is finally here. Online adventures await!

fields.name: Jelly Blocks
fields.description: A unique, simple, relaxing and fun puzzle/match-3 game built using soft body physics.

fields.name: The Jolly Gang's Misadventures in Africa / Масяня в полной Африке
fields.description: Join the Jolly Gang as it heads to Africa in search of treasure! Features retro-cartoon graphics, rib-cracking one-liners, and challenging puzzles!

fields.name: Leaf
fields.description: Leaf is an exploration driven action adventure game where you're on a quest to stabilize two abandoned worlds. On your adventure you stumble across hidden weapons, spells and special items that might help you on your journey.

fields.name: Fidelity
fields.description: Fidelity is an atmospheric puzzle game, based around losing touch with reality. You must break free from your loop by finding all the flaws in your surroundings.

fields.name: Candy Adventure
fields.description: One day a little puppy Candy goes for a walk. Walking is Candy's most favorite thing. Candy enters the strange door while he is playing. What will happen to Candy?

fields.name: Virtual Arctic Expedition
fields.description: Virtual Arctic Expedition is a virtual reality experience involving up to 8 people simultaneously (in a same Local Area Network). The users are immersed together in the same virtual environment. They find themselves in the Arctic seabed where everyone embodies a scuba diver.

fields.name: The Cinema Rosa
fields.description: A classic adventure game set in a haunted cinema, inspired by The Stanley Parable, The Vanishing Of Ethan Carter and Dear Esther.

fields.name: Gray Memory
fields.description: Gray Memory is an instant entertainment game.There are various traps and buttons in the game. You have to solve these traps to get to the next level. This game has the characteristics of adventure and puzzle. It will help to develop your brain.

fields.name: The Prison
fields.description: The Prison is a single-screen local-multiplayer stealth game where players are trying to accomplish goals without drawing attention to them.

fields.name: F18 Carrier Landing
fields.description: F18 Carrier Landing places you in the cockpit of an F/A 18 Hornet. As gamers, we search for experiences that aren’t possible in our daily lives. With F/A 18 Carrier Landing, we’re able to bring the armchair pilot into the cockpit of a fighter jet.

fields.name: Hotel Tutwin
fields.description: Hotel Tutwin is a visual novel designed for horror / romance lovers, but can also be quirky and cute. Each story line is quick and to-the-point, but there are many to discover. Prepare for inevitable deaths.

fields.name: stein.world
fields.description: Stein.world is a real-time MMORPG in a beautiful fantasy world with many common game features from the MMO genre: A big and persistent fantasy world with a lot of variety filled with hundreds of quests and items, dungeons, professions and much more to come.

fields.name: Snipiyo / スナイピヨ
fields.description: An action game using a sniper gun. A sniper's chick that flies freely, it's "Snipiyo"!

fields.name: Callisto
fields.description: The story of a couple that was shared by an unjust fate, events coming in their distant space journey. In this exciting adventure you have to solve many logical puzzles and quests, perform simple tasks, follow the thoughts of the main character and his mythical companion.

fields.name: BLOCKADE Classic
fields.description: BLOCKADE Classic! First Person Shooter in an editable procedural cubic world. A large arsenal of weapons, 4 teams at the same time and up to 32 players on one map. A large number of game modes!

fields.name: Haramatia
fields.description: Haramatia is a terrible and extremely dangerous planet. The once thriving civilization, as usual, destroyed itself, leaving only the gray earth, aggressive animals and distracted biorobots. The main character absolutely does not remember anything, and in the course of the plot will understand who he is and how he turned out to be on this...

fields.name: Onslaught: Armoured Assault
fields.description: Survive the endless onslaught of space, as you create your fleet to take down aliens, pirates and the unknown.

fields.name: Frank and 10 roots
fields.description: Frank and 10 Roots - a challenging isometric platformer. Put both your abilities and nervous system to the test!

fields.name: Arena Stars
fields.description: Choose your Hero, build your Team and take on others in the Arena Stars Universe in this action-packed epic new multiplayer strategy game from Tiny Titan Studios! Arena Stars is a free to play, 1v1 action MOBA for everyone.

fields.name: Even For Eternia
fields.description: Take control of six unlikely heroes as they set out on a journey to discover the source of their mysterious power: The power of becoming an Umbra. Experience a full-length RPG adventure with multiple astounding mechanics and characters.

fields.name: Sexy Miss
fields.description: 12 SEXY GIRLS competing for the title of Miss of the world. Get to know them and decide, which one will win!

fields.name: Fast Travel: Loot Delivery Service
fields.description: Fast Travel is a time trial racing game where you must use a hover bike to navigate strange and dangerous environments to deliver loot boxes. While piloting the hover bike, you must maintain your balance to make sure you lose as little of your cargo as possible and avoid crashing.

fields.name: The Superlatives: Shattered Worlds
fields.description: Conquer assassins and alien invaders in Superlative London! Defend Earth and negotiate interplanetary peace as you race to rescue Queen Victoria in this thrilling sequel to The Superlatives: Aetherfall.

fields.name: Dodge Bubble
fields.description: Dodge bubble is a casual survival game where the aim of the game is to not get popped!.

fields.name: MiniGolf
fields.description: Take a swing at this amazing mini-golf game! Enjoy the realistic gameplay with more than 50 fields to play. Your time on these 3-D greens will amaze you as you play through phenomenal obstacles and unique locations, like a castle, a circus, a factory, and more. Can you come in under par?

fields.name: UNI TURRET
fields.description: It is a shooting game where you control the battery and defeat the enemy.

fields.name: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens
fields.description: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens. Enjoy the VR scenery while exercising and forget the fatigue of exercising. Get fun and keep fit. Rule: Simply hold your controller, and run, to get a VR ride in Maya Gardens.

fields.name: 火柴人和七色彩虹 Stickman's Rainbow
fields.description: The world of stickman was devoured by the darkness, our pitiful stickman losed himself in the night. There is only one way to save this world---collecting seven colorful balls to call the rainbow in the dark world. The stickman is small , weak and helpless, but he is good at running!

fields.name: Uriel’s Chasm 3: Gelshock
fields.description: Fear is eternal. You wake up, the gelatinous, adrenochrome saturated subject of an ancient prophecy, formulated by a brotherhood of abandoned sentient machines; stuck on the cusp of an evolutionary leap.

fields.name: Shadow Run
fields.description: Shadow Run is an arcade game with a very simple mechanics, with random generation and a distance traveled mark, perfect for those who want to beat their own records

fields.name: Pigocefal
fields.description: Pigocefal - crazy top long-time Pig shooter and burgers.

fields.name: Trial of the Towers
fields.description: Confront the Trial of the Towers in this short-and-sweet retro-3D boss rush, inspired by action RPGs and classic games from the '90s. Defeat the bosses and overcome the Trial, no matter how many tries it takes.

fields.name: Snowball Rush
fields.description: Snowball Rush is a Runner-Timekiller game about a funny snowball and many obstacles on the way to the foot of the mountain.

fields.name: 家园/HOME
fields.description: "Home" is a game that integrates survival, fighting, and leisure. You can play freely in this game world. You can stay at home, read books, order takeout, read books, and so on. You can also explore outside, Parkour, and even find monsters and challenge various boss.If you don't play, you'll regret it.

fields.name: Try To Survive
fields.description: Today is a special day. The government decided to make an extraordinary and unpredictable experiment. Its objective is to learn how people are going to behave and what they will do if given full freedom and thus allowed to do just whatever they want for a period of 24 hours.

fields.name: Ballista Legend
fields.description: Spectacular action-puzzler with the ballista in beautiful worlds. 100 spectacular levels are wating for you!

fields.name: Paper Dolls: Original / 纸人：第一章
fields.description: Paper Dolls Original is a first-person horror adventure game steeped in Eastern culture. You act a man who is separated from his daughter after a car accident. When he awakes, he finds himself in a deserted Asian mansion.
fields.developer: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.
fields.publisher: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

fields.name: Digital Diamond Baseball V8
fields.description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a computerized baseball simulator that allows gamers to play individual games, series, or entire seasons, using players from any baseball season in history. Never pay for a new season again!

fields.name: HELPLESS ZOMBIES
fields.description: Fascinating puzzle game that rethinks the gameplay, but retains the spirit of the legendary classic games such as Binary Land, Clu Clu Land and Adventures of Lolo.

fields.name: VCB: Why City 4k
fields.description: This is a parody on one game in open world that mocks modern video-blogging, Russian rap and crazy internet-stuff. And all this in a revolutionary 4k technology. But it is not exactly...

fields.name: House of Evil 2
fields.description: House of Evil 2 - Survival horror survival with a first-person view, in which you can test your nerves for strength. Events take place in the mansion, which exists in reality.

fields.name: Paradox Vector
fields.description: Paradox Vector is an old school first person shooter set in a different dimension. Inspired by the vector graphics games of the early 80's and the impossible geometry of M.C. Escher, Paradox Vector offers a unique look and fast paced action.

fields.name: BLOCKADE War Stories
fields.description: New vision of the Great Patriotic War in the style of Blockade3D! New heroes, new adventures, dangerous tasks, crowds of enemies and a unique atmosphere - all this is Blockade War Stories!

fields.name: Heidentum
fields.description: Heidentum is a multiplayer strategy game where you choose your Paganism and fight for it until your enemies are defeated.

fields.name: Burning Daylight
fields.description: Waking up naked in a slaughterhouse, you must escape and travel through a dystopian world to uncover the truth of your origins. Burning Daylight is a sci-fi adventure game, set in a dystopian future with light puzzle elements and environmental storytelling.

fields.name: GlassSmash
fields.description: GlassSmash is indie puzzle game with glass smashing by sledgehammer.

fields.name: Adecke - Cards Games Deluxe
fields.description: Cards Games Collection : Cribbage, Military Whist, Bull, President, Hockey, Speed

fields.name: Hexa Path
fields.description: Put your logical thinking skills to the ultimate test! Hexa Path is the perfect puzzle game to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking abilities. Solve challenging yet rewarding puzzles while listening to the atmospheric soundtrack.

fields.name: Perplexity: Suburban Home
fields.description: Perplexity: Suburban Home is a VR game designed for the HTC Vive. Solve puzzles and find items to use in those puzzles, or just make your own fun trashing a virtual home.

fields.name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Paintings
fields.description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Paintings is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, in a artsy style.

fields.name: Assault of the Robots
fields.description: Assault of the Robots is an action game where you will fight across different countries like Germany and Great Britain with different robots.

fields.name: Zom-bie, or Not Zom-bie
fields.description: New installment in the zombie survival RPG genre and a first from Games Master Mind!
fields.developer: John Michael O'Brien II, Games Master Mind
fields.publisher: John Michael O'Brien II, Games Master Mind

fields.name: KillStreak.tv
fields.description: KILLSTREAK.tv is a quick fire 3rd-person multiplayer shooter! Jump in arenas, kill opponents, earn rewards to level up gear, unlock new items and customize your character and weapons.

fields.name: Virtual Skydiving
fields.description: Feel the thrill and fear of leaping from a plane in this VR Skydiving Simulator, Fall through the clouds and pull your chute for a safe landing. Land near the flare for max Points!
fields.developer: Virtual Reality Experience, Classy Bogan Studios
fields.publisher: Virtual Reality Experience, Classy Bogan Studios

fields.name: Witch Ring Meister
fields.description: Management simulation idle game Witch Ring Meister, you'll become Marietta from the gem store, manage your store, grow with your partners, aim for the prize of "Miss Design"!

fields.name: Lover Bands
fields.description: Lover Bands is a 2-player cooperative platform game where you are tied together. Drag your non-gamer friend's dead body over the finish line!

fields.name: TOK HARDCORE
fields.description: TOK HARDCORE is a logical puzzle in which you need to connect all points with lines.

fields.name: Archibald 2
fields.description: Continuation of the arcade game Archibald. Added new levels and mechanics.

fields.name: Drive for Your Life
fields.description: Do you have what it takes to drive through the middle of a zombie apocalypse? Push yourself to the limit and test your skills!

fields.name: Chaos Starter
fields.description: Chaos Starter is a fight simulator with realistic physics. You are going to find yourself in different life situations, and every time you will have to start a chaos. No matter where are you and what you are doing, your only task is to spoil the event and initiate a brawl.

fields.name: Granny Simulator
fields.description: In Granny Simulator there are two players, a feeble old grandmother and her lovely grandson. The grandmothers objective is to complete her every day routine while the grandson utilizes uncanny violence and pure brutality to stop her.

fields.name: Foxyland 2
fields.description: Get ready to plunge into an exciting new platforming adventure with Foxy!

fields.name: Bunker - Nightmare Begins
fields.description: Bunker (Nightmare Begins) experience, survive and escape, from a bunker where each of your games will be different from the previous one. Wander in the corridors where the darkness will not be your only enemy.

fields.name: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number
fields.description: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!
fields.developer: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number
fields.publisher: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number

fields.name: Bot Battles
fields.description: Build your bot and battle against other players. Be the last bot standing to win the game.

fields.name: Easy puzzle: Animals
fields.description: This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, different animals are...

fields.name: krAsAvA Shot
fields.description: 2079 planet Earth. Together with the spacecraft conducting the expedition on Mars, the earth gets an unknown virus. Almost the entire population of the planet exposed to infection and mutated into zombies.

fields.name: Alice in Stardom
fields.description: Can you manage to beat your competitors to be the next top idol- and maybe even win their hearts in the process?

fields.name: JQ: cosmos
fields.description: JQ: cosmos - this is a quiz game about space.

fields.name: Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands (Premium Edition)
fields.description: Support Iris and Robin and help them to win the Magical Tournament in "Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands"! With help from new and old friends, new improvements to the farm, and unique upgrades, this Time Management game will have you occupied for hours!

fields.name: Elon Must - Road to Respect
fields.description: Help Elon Must make his way from Earth to Mars to pay respects to the deceased robot Opportunity.

fields.name: DevilShaft: TheTower
fields.description: DevilShaft: TheTower tells the story of the heroes who tried to fight evil from the very beginning of time. After the invasion of demonic forces on the ground, the heroes tried in every way to expel them from their land.

fields.name: Mine the Gold
fields.description: Gold, diamonds, and dynamite? That's right, you're a goldminer and it's your job to mine as much gold as you can and come out with the most money. Are you ready? Time to goldrush!

fields.name: The Cat and the Box
fields.description: Built on no engine or external libraries, this game takes you through a 3D adventure rendered in a plain text window.

fields.name: EndlessHell
fields.description: Endless Hell is a third-person action game. The game advances through a linear process, killing monsters to gain resources, improving their skill level, and killing the boss to the next level by killing the level.

fields.name: Embark
fields.description: Inspired by the deep simulation of Dwarf Fortress, the open world survival of Minecraft, and the social interactions of The Sims. Embark is a colony management game with a focus on complex simulation in a huge living 3D world.

fields.name: 10-4 Indirect Contact
fields.description: 10-4 Indirect Contact is a RTT game. Player who acts as a commander , commands the girl operators to complete missions,like exterminating enemies,liberating hostages and dismantling installations,etc.

fields.name: Swords and Sandals Classic Collection
fields.description: "Gladiator ... gladiator ... gladiator ... Swords and Sandals, Gladiatorrrrr!"If this refrain means anything to you, then you grew up playing the legendary Swords and Sandals turn based combat game series. These games have been played over half a billion times, and for good reason.

fields.name: Minions Battle
fields.description: Minions.... To your weapons! Take your sniper or M4 and destroy your opponents!

fields.name: Awakening: The Dreamless Castle
fields.description: After Awakening in a mysterious castle it’s up to you to collect clues and items needed to solve perplexing puzzles and escape!

fields.name: Metal Country
fields.description: Not even alien invasion can stop this guitarist from playing on his concert. Play as Amadoni, a guitarist on a hover board fighting alien invasion with using his musics.

fields.name: Game Of Puzzles: Nature
fields.description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

fields.name: Argonauts Agency: Pandora's Box
fields.description: Argonaut Agency – chaos has emerged from Pandora's Box! Only you can stop the apocalypse!

fields.name: Erannorth Reborn
fields.description: Erannorth Reborn is a Rogue-lite, Deck Building RPG game. You take on the role of a supernatural creature (or a human with supernatural abilities), as he or she struggles to survive through a relentless pursuit from the Order of Light.

fields.name: Eyes of Fear
fields.description: Eyes of Fear - an elementary 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass quite difficult levels, playing for an alien.

fields.name: City Zombies
fields.description: Find weapons and destroy hordes of zombies before they devour you!

fields.name: 3x3 mini-Shogi
fields.description: This video game is creating to referencing to Japanese traditional board game "Shogi". Shogi is a game very similar to chess. You choose 3 pieces and play 3 times for play on board of 9 squares with limited pieces. You don't need to know how to move the pieces. This game will guide you.

fields.name: Border Officer
fields.description: Usually everyone is unemployed here. But by chance you got a job. You'il work for the state.Everyone in your family is sick or unemployed, only you can help them. You're an immigrant officer.

fields.name: The Kaiju Offensive
fields.description: The Kaiju Offensive is a 2D top-down brawler where you fight as a giant monster. In this arcade-inspired romp, your objective is plain and simple. You, the kaiju, need to destroy all the buildings in the city.

fields.name: Earthshakers
fields.description: Earthshakers is an action shooting game that fights against enemies as a post-human "puppeteer" born with the ability to manipulate machines in the future world where the war between humans and machines is deepening.

fields.name: Geometry May. I swear it's a nice free game
fields.description: I swear it's a nice runner game

fields.name: Moon Pool
fields.description: Ever wonder what it'd be like to go spelunking with a parachute? Ever wonder what it'd be like to be a Cow? Of course not, because why wonder when you can play this game!

fields.name: Sim 4K VR MediaPlayer
fields.description: A high-performance VR media player that can play media files greater than 4K. If you have a high-performance GPU, you can play files with a QUHD (7680 × 4320) resolution.

fields.name: Candy Girl
fields.description: 3 match a game, win and undress sexy girls. Collect 3 identical candies to receive points, the more points, the girl will undress quicker.

fields.name: Sin Slayers: The First Sin
fields.description: Sin Slayers is an RPG with roguelike elements set in a dark fantasy world, where your choices determine how challenging the fights and enemies will be. You have arrived in an unfamiliar place, where demons are kings. Find a way to get out of here or wander these lands endlessly.

fields.name: Funny Bunny: Adventures
fields.description: Nice looking and fun game, that develops logical thinking and responsivity. It is highly recommended for children!

fields.name: Twinkle Star - 未来はすぐそこで待っている
fields.description: "Twinkle Star - 未来はすぐそこで待っている" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Girls under the Blue Sky", so we have created a special customized "Twinkle Star - Future Waiting" for...

fields.name: Nyasha Land of Elves
fields.description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

fields.name: A Legionary's Life
fields.description: A Legionary's Life lets you play as a Roman soldier during the years of the Second Punic War and beyond. Rise up through the ranks and win prestigious awards or just focus on making it home in one piece; it's up to you.

fields.name: Franchise Wars
fields.description: Franchise Wars is a turn-based isometric puzzle strategy game, or puzzegy game. Play as Frog Pop, one of the last remaining fast food restaurants, on a campaign to destroy arch-rival Munch Point. Control various units, each with a unique mechanic, as you set out to best the food service industry.
fields.developer: Jolly Crouton Media Ltd., Tiny Warrior Games
fields.publisher: Jolly Crouton Media Ltd., Tiny Warrior Games

fields.name: ArchMMO 2
fields.description: ArchMMO 2 is a Voxel 3D MMORPG with races, factions, guilds, parties, pets, mounts, PvP, PvE, quests, and an open-world map! Explore the world of Arch today!

fields.name: 胜利即正义! / Victory is justice！
fields.description: 一个人制作的多人联网竞技游戏，不到5分钟一局的快节奏比赛，爽快体验，快速上手，适合游戏排队期间开一局，融合了吃鸡，MOBA，IO游戏的元素，独特的英雄，自由搭配的技能组合，召唤机甲，收集无限宝石，10杀吃鸡。 丰富的场景和道具，草丛，毒气，爆炸物，传送门，地图装备等等。游戏内可以自由加点选择成长方向，解锁装备丰富的策略组合。全球同服天梯系统，代表自己的国家出战。还有更快节奏的1v1系统。 游戏内若有不足望大家能够包涵，希望以后可以继续做游戏给你们，谢谢。

fields.name: Top Burger
fields.description: Top Burger is an exciting fast food simulation game. You just opened a burger restaurant, let's see if you can put together burgers fast enough to satisfy your ever growing number of customers!

fields.name: Treasure Masters, Inc.: The Lost City
fields.description: Join a pair of treasure hunters as they race around the world to be the first to find a lost city! Designed for fans of classic hidden object games and offering one thrill after another, Treasure Masters, Inc.: The Lost City will leave you breathless!

fields.name: The Underground Watcher/地下监察员
fields.description: This is a story about a girl working underground, experiencing some people and some things.

fields.name: Skully Pinball
fields.description: Skully Pinball is a game that reproduces the classic machines of the 90s in two different themes!

fields.name: The Renovator
fields.description: In this game you’re an experienced restorer currently working in a museum workshop. The restorer’s friend requested him to fix some old exhibits. From that moment his adventure starts.

fields.name: PUZZLE: OCEAN
fields.description: PUZZLE: OCEAN - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get a picture of different marine fauna.

fields.name: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
fields.description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary – the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

fields.name: D.H.Trouble Guy
fields.description: D.H.Trouble Guy - Hardcore platformer with elements of a shooter. Under your control, an ordinary guy, his only difference is the pistol and Kalashnikov assault rifle.

fields.name: Space Trade Fleet 1.5
fields.description: Assemble the space fleet. Raise funds by transporting trade items.

fields.name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 4
fields.description: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 4 is a horror-mystery adventure game. Explore your suburb and work out where your neighbours have disappeared to and who's watching you from the shadows.

fields.name: Homeless Simulator
fields.description: Homeless Simulator is a homeless person simulator. Homeless persons are those who find themselves living on the streets because of family conflicts, somebody’s fraud, loss of the job or health problems. They are those who need help.

fields.name: Magic Clouds
fields.description: Magic Clouds - pixel puzzle, in which all the puzzles fly in the clouds.

fields.name: Die, zombie sausage, die!
fields.description: Arcade for the little ones. Hold on to the table against the zombie sausages as long as possible. Make your way to the top of the leaderboard.

fields.name: Hello, World.
fields.description: Complete quests for the creatures of this world to unlock items, buildings and perks for your village. Control your villagers' resources, happiness and whereabouts while exploring this odd land with its quirky stories.

fields.name: Scream of the Viking 3
fields.description: Scream of the Viking 3 - this is the third part of the hardcore platformer about Vikings. In the third part you as well as in the previous need to pass the levels, playing for a Viking.

fields.name: Nyasha Valkyrie
fields.description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

fields.name: Peas Adventure
fields.description: Peas Adventure is a fun and challenging game where the main idea is to use a small wooden cannon to throw all the peas inside the basket to save them.

fields.name: Blacksmith Run
fields.description: Go with the brave blacksmith on his journey for the Hammer of Gods. To get the legendary tool, you have to overcome 20 hardcore levels filled with deadly traps!

fields.name: Scream of the Viking REDUX
fields.description: Scream of the Viking REDUX - is the final part of that hardcore platformer with surviving elements where you are going to do lots of various levels for the Viking.

fields.name: MonteCube Dodge
fields.description: Survive by dodging and deflecting enemies, objects and obstacles in VR. You are placed in an environment where you need to be agile and on your feet.

The history of the driver, Alexander Rasputin, he goes on an internship to manage the train, and enters the paranormal world with his mentor. You have to uncover the secret of the train 6120, and its passengers!

fields.name: 12 HOURS
fields.description: The protagonist was in a very nightmarish and realistic lucid dream, he needed to find a way to wake up, avoiding the creepy creature that was chasing him. Find a way to wake up, each time the level is generated randomly.

fields.name: The Mystery of Bikini Island
fields.description: Solve puzzles and meet beautiful women in this point and click erotic RPG!

fields.name: CaptainMarlene
fields.description: In the game CaptainMarlene, you control the spacecraft shortening the danger.

fields.name: Old Edge II
fields.description: Old Edge II - is the second part of that hardcore platformer about the lithic age where you will have to do lots of levels playing as an ancient man.

fields.name: Deatherem
fields.description: Deatherem is a first person survival horror experience that takes place in an abandoned hotel.

fields.name: Room of Pandora
fields.description: The Room of Pandora is a third-person interactive puzzle game. The little man is trapped in a strange room in the game, you need to look for clues in the room, using the props in the room and interacting with the little man to solve the puzzle of each room. There are seven endings, corresponding to seven achievements.

fields.name: Cyber Gun
fields.description: Cyber Gun is a hardcore first-person shooter with platformer elements.

fields.name: Super Star Blast
fields.description: Super Star Blast is a space based game with challenging levels of increasing difficulty. All enemies must be shot down to finish a level and go to the next one. A scanner around the player tells roughly where the enemies are located.

fields.name: New Yankee 7: Deer Hunters
fields.description: Pursue a snow-white deer through an enchanted forest and discover a magical mystery in the days of King Arthur! Answer the call of a king and begin the hunt today!

fields.name: Rune Lord
fields.description: A portal has opened and dark magic is pouring through! Only you can close the gateway and defeat the evil Ice Golem. But you'll need to hurry: time is short!
